transliteration.ur: سبھهُوں سرب ٹھَور پهِچانا ۔۔۸۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kwl rhq An kwl srUpw ]

en.bdb: He is deathless and a non-temporal Entity.

pu.ss: auh kwl (imRqU) qoN pry Aqy aus dw srUp kwl (dIAW sImwvw) qoN mukq hY;
pu.bdb: auh kwl (imRqU) qoN pry Aqy aus dw srUp kwl (dIAW sImwvw) qoN mukq hY;

transliteration.en: kaal rahat an kaal saroopaa ||
transliteration.hi: काल रहत अन काल सरूपा ॥
transliteration.ur: کال رهت ان کال سرُوپا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AlK purK Abgq AvDUqw ]

en.bdb: He is Imperceptible Purusha, Unmanifested and Unscathed.

pu.ss: auh nw jwixAw jw skx vwlw, AivAkq, mwieAwvI pRBwv qoN mukq purS hY।
pu.bdb: auh nw jwixAw jw skx vwlw, AivAkq, mwieAwvI pRBwv qoN mukq purS hY।

transliteration.en: alakh purakh abagat avadhootaa ||
transliteration.hi: अलख पुरख अबगत अवधूता ॥
transliteration.ur: الکھ پُرکھ ابگت اودھُوتا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jwq pwq ijh ichn n brnw ]

en.bdb: He Who is without caste, lineage, mark and colour.

pu.ss: aus dI jwiq, brwdrI, icMnH Aqy vrn nhIN hY।
pu.bdb: aus dI jwiq, brwdrI, icMnH Aqy vrn nhIN hY।

transliteration.en: jaat paat jeh chihan na baranaa ||
transliteration.hi: जात पात जिह चिहन न बरना ॥
transliteration.ur: جات پات جه چهن ن برنا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Abgq dyv ACY An Brmw ]9]

en.bdb: The Unmanifest Lord is Indestructible and ever Stable.9.

pu.ss: auh AivAkq, AivnwSI Aqy Brmw qoN rihq prm-s`qw hY ]9]
pu.bdb: auh AivAkq, AivnwSI Aqy Brmw qoN rihq prm-s`qw hY ]9]

transliteration.en: abagat dhev achhai an bharamaa ||9||
transliteration.hi: अबगत देव अछै अन भरमा ॥९॥
transliteration.ur: ابگت دےو اچھَے ان بھرما ۔۔۹۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sB ko kwl sBn ko krqw ]

en.bdb: He is the Destroyer of all and Creator of all.

pu.ss: auh sB dw nwS krn vwlw Aqy sB dw isrjk hY;
pu.bdb: auh sB dw nwS krn vwlw Aqy sB dw isrjk hY;

transliteration.en: sabh ko kaal sabhan ko karataa ||
transliteration.hi: सभ को काल सभन को करता ॥
transliteration.ur: سبھ کو کال سبھن کو کرتا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: rog sog doKn ko hrqw ]

en.bdb: He is the Remover of maladies, sufferings and blemishes.

pu.ss: auh rog, sog Aqy doKw (pwpw) nUM nwS krn vwlw hY।
pu.bdb: auh rog, sog Aqy doKw (pwpw) nUM nwS krn vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: rog sog dhokhan ko harataa ||
transliteration.hi: रोग सोग दोखन को हरता ॥
transliteration.ur: روگ سوگ دوکھن کو هرتا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: eyk ic`q ijh iek iCn iDAwieE ]

en.bdb: He Who meditates upon Him with single mind even for an instant

pu.ss: aus dw ijs ny iekwgR ic`q iek iCx leI vI iDAwn kIqw hY,
pu.bdb: aus dw ijs ny iekwgR ic`q iek iCx leI vI iDAwn kIqw hY,

transliteration.en: ek chi't jeh ik chhin dhiaaio ||
transliteration.hi: एक चित्त जिह इक छिन धिआइओ ॥
transliteration.ur: اےک چّت جه اک چھن دھآااو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kwl Pws ky bIc n AwieE ]10]

en.bdb: He doth not come within the trap of death. 10.

pu.ss: auh iPr kwl (imRqU) dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]10]
pu.bdb: auh iPr kwl (imRqU) dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]10]

transliteration.en: kaal faas ke beech na aaio ||10||
transliteration.hi: काल फास के बीच न आइओ ॥१०॥
transliteration.ur: کال پھاس کے بیِچ ن آااو ۔۔۱۰۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qÍ pRswid ] kib`q ]

en.bdb: BY THY GRACE KABITT

pu.ss: qyrI ikRpw nwl: kibq:
pu.bdb: qyrI ikRpw nwl: kibq:

transliteration.en: tavai prasaadh || kabi't ||
transliteration.hi: त्व प्रसादि ॥ कबित्त ॥
transliteration.ur: تو پرساد ۔۔ کبّت ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM sucyq huie kY cyqnw ko cwr kIE kqhUM AicMq huie kY sovq Acyq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere becoming Conscious, Thou adrnest consciousness ,  somewhere becoming Carefree, thou sleepest unconsciously.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU! qUM) ikqy sucyq ho ky cyqnw nUM suMdr (mnohr) bxwieAw hY Aqy ikqy insicMq ho ky GUk su`qw hoieAw hYN।
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU! qUM) ikqy sucyq ho ky cyqnw nUM suMdr (mnohr) bxwieAw hY Aqy ikqy insicMq ho ky GUk su`qw hoieAw hYN।

transliteration.en: katahoo(n) suchet hui kai chetanaa ko chaar keeo katahoo(n) achi(n)t hui kai sovat achet ho ||
transliteration.hi: कतहूँ सुचेत हुइ कै चेतना को चार कीओ कतहूँ अचिंत हुइ कै सोवत अचेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں سُچےت هُا کَے چےتنا کو چار کیِاو کتهُوں اچںت هُا کَے سووت اچےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM iBKwrI huie kY mWgq iPrq BIK khUM mhw dwn huie kY mWigE Dn dyq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere becoming a beggar, Thou beggest alms and somewhere becoming a Supreme Donor, Thou bestowest the begged wealth.

pu.ss: ikqy qUM iBKwrI bx ky iBiKAw mMgdw iPrdw hYN Aqy ikqy mhwdwnI bx ky mUMh-mMigAw Dn idMdw hYN।
pu.bdb: ikqy qUM iBKwrI bx ky iBiKAw mMgdw iPrdw hYN Aqy ikqy mhwdwnI bx ky mUMh-mMigAw Dn idMdw hYN।

transliteration.en: katahoo(n) bhikhaaree hui kai maa(n)gat firat bheekh kahoo(n) mahaa dhaan hui kai maa(n)gio dhan dhet ho ||
transliteration.hi: कतहूँ भिखारी हुइ कै माँगत फिरत भीख कहूँ महा दान हुइ कै माँगिओ धन देत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں بھکھاریِ هُا کَے ماںگت پھرت بھیِکھ کهُوں مها دان هُا کَے ماںگاو دھن دےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM mhW rwjn ko dIjq AnMq dwn khUM mhW rwjn qy CIn iCq lyq ho ]

en.bdb: Some where Thou givest inexhaustible gifts to emperors and somewhere Thou deprivest the emperors of their kingdoms.

pu.ss: ikqy mhwrwijAW nUM vI AnMq (in`DIAW) dwn idMdw hYN Aqy ikqy mhwrwijAW qoN DrqI (dI bwdSwhI) Koh lYNdw hYN।
pu.bdb: ikqy mhwrwijAW nUM vI AnMq (in`DIAW) dwn idMdw hYN Aqy ikqy mhwrwijAW qoN DrqI (dI bwdSwhI) Koh lYNdw hYN।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) mahaa(n) raajan ko dheejat ana(n)t dhaan kahoo(n) mahaa(n) raajan te chheen chhit let ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ महाँ राजन को दीजत अनंत दान कहूँ महाँ राजन ते छीन छित लेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں مهاں راجن کو دیِجت انںت دان کهُوں مهاں راجن تے چھیٍن چھت لےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM qw isau ibpRIq khUM iqRgun AqIq khUM surgun smyq ho ]1]11]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou workest in accordance with Vedic rites and somewhere Thou art quite opposed to it,  somewhere Thou art without three modes of maya and somewhere Thou hast all godly attributes.1.11.

pu.ss: ikqy qUM vydw dI rIq AnuswrI hYN Aqy ikqy aunHw qoN ault hYN, ikqy qUM iqMnw guxw qoN pry Aqy ikqy swry guxw nwl Xukq hYN ]1]11]
pu.bdb: ikqy qUM vydw dI rIq AnuswrI hYN Aqy ikqy aunHw qoN ault hYN, ikqy qUM iqMnw guxw qoN pry Aqy ikqy swry guxw nwl Xukq hYN ]1]11]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh reet kahoo(n) taa siau bipreet kahoo(n) tiragun ateet kahoo(n) suragun samet ho ||1||11||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद रीत कहूँ ता सिउ बिप्रीत कहूँ तृगुन अतीत कहूँ सुरगुन समेत हो ॥१॥११॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد ریِت کهُوں تا سا بپریِت کهُوں ترگن اتیِت کهُوں سُرگن سمےت هو ۔۔۱۔۔۱۱۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM j`C gMDRb aurg khUM ibidAwDr khUM Bey ikMnr ipswc khUM pRyq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art Yaksha, Gandharva, Sheshanaga and Vidyadhar and somewhere Thou becomest Kinnar, Pishacha and Preta.

pu.ss: ikqy qUM XkS, gMDrb, s`p ('aurg') Aqy ividAwDr hYN, ikqy ikMnr, ipSwc Aqy pRyq Awid hYN।
pu.bdb: ikqy qUM XkS, gMDrb, s`p ('aurg') Aqy ividAwDr hYN, ikqy ikMnr, ipSwc Aqy pRyq Awid hYN।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) ja'chh ga(n)dhrab urag kahoo(n) bidhiaadhar kahoo(n) bhe ki(n)nar pisaach kahoo(n) pret ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ जच्छ गंध्रब उरग कहूँ बिदिआधर कहूँ भए किंनर पिसाच कहूँ प्रेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں جّچھ گںدھرب اُرگ کهُوں بدآدھر کهُوں بھاے کنّر پساچ کهُوں پرےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM huie kY ihMdUAw gwieqRI ko gupq jipE khUM huie kY qurkw pukwry bWg dyq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou becomest a Hindu and repeatest Gayatri secretly: Somewhere becoming a Turk Thou callest Muslims to worship.

pu.ss: ikqy nUM ihMdU ho ky gwieqRI dw gupq jwp krn vwlw hYN; Aqy ikqy muslmwn ho ky au`cI Awvwz ivc bwg idMdw hYN।
pu.bdb: ikqy nUM ihMdU ho ky gwieqRI dw gupq jwp krn vwlw hYN; Aqy ikqy muslmwn ho ky au`cI Awvwz ivc bwg idMdw hYN।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) hui kai hi(n)dhooaa gaitree ko gupat japio kahoo(n) hui kai turakaa pukaare baa(n)g dhet ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ हुइ कै हिंदूआ गाइत्री को गुपत जपिओ कहूँ हुइ कै तुरका पुकारे बाँग देत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں هُا کَے هںدُوآ گااتریِ کو گُپت جپاو کهُوں هُا کَے تُرکا پُکارے باںگ دےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM kok kwb huie kY purwn ko pVq mq kqhUM kurwn ko indwn jwn lyq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere being a poet thou recitest the Pauranic wisdom and somewhere Thou recitest the Pauranic wisdom and somewhere Thou comprehendest the essence of Quran.

pu.ss: ikqy qUM kok kvI (ivdvwn pMifq) ho ky purwx dy mq nUM pVHn vwlw hYN, kdy kurwn dy q`qÍ-swr nUM smJx vwlw hYN।
pu.bdb: ikqy qUM kok kvI (ivdvwn pMifq) ho ky purwx dy mq nUM pVHn vwlw hYN, kdy kurwn dy q`qÍ-swr nUM smJx vwlw hYN।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) kok kaab hui kai puraan ko paRat mat katahoo(n) kuraan ko nidhaan jaan let ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ कोक काब हुइ कै पुरान को पड़त मत कतहूँ कुरान को निदान जान लेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں کوک کاب هُا کَے پُران کو پڑت مت کتهُوں کُران کو ندان جان لےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM qw isau ibpRIq khUM iqRgun AqIq khUM surgun smyq ho ]2]12]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou workest in accordance with Vedic rites and somewhere Thou art quite opposed to it ;  somewhere Thou art without threee modes of maya and somewhere Thou hast all godly attributes. 2.12.

pu.ss: ikqy qUM vyd dI mrXwdw (rIq) hYN Aqy ikqy aus dy iblkul ault hYN। ikqy qUM iqMn guxw qoN pry hYN Aqy ikqy swry guxw nwl Xukq hYN ]2]12]
pu.bdb: ikqy qUM vyd dI mrXwdw (rIq) hYN Aqy ikqy aus dy iblkul ault hYN। ikqy qUM iqMn guxw qoN pry hYN Aqy ikqy swry guxw nwl Xukq hYN ]2]12]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh reet kahoo(n) taa siau bipreet kahoo(n) tiragun ateet kahoo(n) suragun samet ho ||2||12||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद रीत कहूँ ता सिउ बिप्रीत कहूँ तृगुन अतीत कहूँ सुरगुन समेत हो ॥२॥१२॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد ریِت کهُوں تا سا بپریِت کهُوں ترگن اتیِت کهُوں سُرگن سمےت هو ۔۔۲۔۔۱۲۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM dyvqwn ky idvwn mY ibrwjmwn khUM dwnvwn ko gumwn mq dyq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art seated in the Court of gods and somewhere Thou givest the egoistic intellect to demons.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) ikqy qusIN dyviqAW dI sBw (dIvwn) ivc ibrwjmwn ho Aqy ikqy dYNqw nUM hMkwr dI slwh dy rhy ho।
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) ikqy qusIN dyviqAW dI sBw (dIvwn) ivc ibrwjmwn ho Aqy ikqy dYNqw nUM hMkwr dI slwh dy rhy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) dhevataan ke dhivaan mai biraajamaan kahoo(n) dhaanavaan ko gumaan mat dhet ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ देवतान के दिवान मै बिराजमान कहूँ दानवान को गुमान मत देत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں دےوتان کے دوان مَے براجمان کهُوں دانوان کو گُمان مت دےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM ieMdR rwjw ko imlq ieMdR pdvI sI khUM ieMdR pdvI iCpwie CIn lyq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou Bestowest the position of of the king of gods to Indra and somewhere Thou deprivest Indra of this position.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN ieMdr rwjw nUM ieMdrpd pRdwn kr rhy ho Aqy ikqy ieMdr-pd Koh ky lukw lYNdy ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN ieMdr rwjw nUM ieMdrpd pRdwn kr rhy ho Aqy ikqy ieMdr-pd Koh ky lukw lYNdy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) i(n)dhr raajaa ko milat i(n)dhr padhavee see kahoo(n) i(n)dhr padhavee chhipai chheen let ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ इंद्र राजा को मिलत इंद्र पदवी सी कहूँ इंद्र पदवी छिपाइ छीन लेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں اںدر راجا کو ملت اںدر پدویِ سیِ کهُوں اںدر پدویِ چھپاا چھیٍن لےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM ibcwr Aibcwr ko ibcwrq ho khUM inj nwr pr nwr ky inkyq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou discriminatest between good and bad intellect, somewhere Thou art with Thy own spouse and somewhere with another’s wife.

pu.ss: ikqy suivcwrw nUM Aqy ikqy kuivcwrw nUM ivcwrdy ho Aqy ikqy inj-nwrI Aqy ikqy pr-nwrI dy (ipAwr dy) kyWdr (Gr) ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy suivcwrw nUM Aqy ikqy kuivcwrw nUM ivcwrdy ho Aqy ikqy inj-nwrI Aqy ikqy pr-nwrI dy (ipAwr dy) kyWdr (Gr) ho।

transliteration.en: katahoo(n) bichaar abichaar ko bichaarat ho kahoo(n) nij naar par naar ke niket ho ||
transliteration.hi: कतहूँ बिचार अबिचार को बिचारत हो कहूँ निज नार पर नार के निकेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں بچار ابچار کو بچارت هو کهُوں نج نار پر نار کے نکےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM qw isau ibpRIq khUM iqRgun AqIq khUM surgun smyq ho ]3]13]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou workest in accordance with Vedic rites and somewhere Thou art quite opposed to it,  somewhere Thou art without three modes of maya and somewhere Thou hast all godly attributes. 3.13.

pu.ss: ikqy vydw dI rIq (mrXwdw) ho Aqy ikqy aus qoN ault ho, ikqy iqMnw guxw qoN pry Aqy ikqy swry guxw nwl Xukq ho ]3]13]
pu.bdb: ikqy vydw dI rIq (mrXwdw) ho Aqy ikqy aus qoN ault ho, ikqy iqMnw guxw qoN pry Aqy ikqy swry guxw nwl Xukq ho ]3]13]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh reet kahoo(n) taa siau bipreet kahoo(n) tiragun ateet kahoo(n) suragun samet ho ||3||13||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद रीत कहूँ ता सिउ बिप्रीत कहूँ तृगुन अतीत कहूँ सुरगुन समेत हो ॥३॥१३॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد ریِت کهُوں تا سا بپریِت کهُوں ترگن اتیِت کهُوں سُرگن سمےت هو ۔۔۳۔۔۱۳۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM ssqRDwrI khUM ibidAw ky ibcwrI khUM mwrq AhwrI khUM nwr ky inkyq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art an armed warrior, somewhere Thou art an armed warrior, somewhere a learned thinker, somewhere a hunter and somewhere an enjoyer of women.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) ikqy qusIN SsqRDwrI (XoDw) ho, ikqy ividAw dw ivcwr krn vwly (ivdvwn) ho, ikqy pOx (mwrq) dw Awhwr krn vwly (iSv) ho Aqy ikqy jl (nwr) ivc invws krn vwly (ivSxU-nwrwiex) ho।
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) ikqy qusIN SsqRDwrI (XoDw) ho, ikqy ividAw dw ivcwr krn vwly (ivdvwn) ho, ikqy pOx (mwrq) dw Awhwr krn vwly (iSv) ho Aqy ikqy jl (nwr) ivc invws krn vwly (ivSxU-nwrwiex) ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) sasatradhaaree kahoo(n) bidhiaa ke bichaaree kahoo(n) maarat ahaaree kahoo(n) naar ke niket ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ ससत्रधारी कहूँ बिदिआ के बिचारी कहूँ मारत अहारी कहूँ नार के निकेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں سستردھاریِ کهُوں بدآ کے بچاریِ کهُوں مارت اهاریِ کهُوں نار کے نکےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM dyvbwnI khUM swrdw BvwnI khUM mMglw imRVwnI khUM isAwm khUM syq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the divine speech, somewhere Sarada and Bhavani, somewhere Durga, the trampler of corpses, somewhere in black colour and somewhere in white colour.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN dyv bwxI (AwkwS bwxI) ho, ikqy srsvqI Aqy pwrbqI ho, ikqy durgw Aqy iSvw (imRVwnI) ho Aqy ikqy qusIN kwly rMg vwlI ho Aqy ikqy s&Yd vrx vwlI ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN dyv bwxI (AwkwS bwxI) ho, ikqy srsvqI Aqy pwrbqI ho, ikqy durgw Aqy iSvw (imRVwnI) ho Aqy ikqy qusIN kwly rMg vwlI ho Aqy ikqy s&Yd vrx vwlI ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) dhevabaanee kahoo(n) saaradhaa bhavaanee kahoo(n) ma(n)galaa miraRaanee kahoo(n) siaam kahoo(n) set ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ देवबानी कहूँ सारदा भवानी कहूँ मंगला मृड़ानी कहूँ सिआम कहूँ सेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں دےوبانیِ کهُوں ساردا بھوانیِ کهُوں مںگلا مرڑانیِ کهُوں سآم کهُوں سےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM Drm DwmI khUM srb Taur gwmI khUM jqI khUM kwmI khUM dyq khUM lyq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art abode of Dharma (righteousness), somewhere All-Pervading, somewhere a celibate, somewhere a lustful person, somewhere a donor and somewhere a taker.

pu.ss: ikqy Drm-Dwm (Drm dI mrXwdw rKx vwly) ho Aqy ikqy sB Qw ivcrn krn vwly (srb ivAwpI) ho, ikqy jq-sq Dwrn krn vwly ho Aqy ikqy kwm ivc KuS (aulwsI) ho; ikqy dwn dyx vwly ho Aqy ikqy dwn lYx vwly ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy Drm-Dwm (Drm dI mrXwdw rKx vwly) ho Aqy ikqy sB Qw ivcrn krn vwly (srb ivAwpI) ho, ikqy jq-sq Dwrn krn vwly ho Aqy ikqy kwm ivc KuS (aulwsI) ho; ikqy dwn dyx vwly ho Aqy ikqy dwn lYx vwly ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) dharam dhaamee kahoo(n) sarab Thaur gaamee kahoo(n) jatee kahoo(n) kaamee kahoo(n) dhet kahoo(n) let ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ धरम धामी कहूँ सरब ठउर गामी कहूँ जती कहूँ कामी कहूँ देत कहूँ लेत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں دھرم دھامیِ کهُوں سرب ٹھار گامیِ کهُوں جتیِ کهُوں کامیِ کهُوں دےت کهُوں لےت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM qw isau ibpRIq khUM iqRgun AqIq khUM surgun smyq ho ]4]14]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou workest in accordance with Vedic rites, and somewhere Thou art quite opposed to it,  somewhere Thou art without three modes of maya and somewhere Thou hast all gldly attributes.4.14.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN vyd-rIq nUM pwlx vwly ho Aqy ikqy ies qoN ault ho, ikqy iqMnw guxw (rjo, sqo, qmo) qoN pry ho Aqy ikqy ieMnHw guxw nwl sMXukq ho ]4]14]
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN vyd-rIq nUM pwlx vwly ho Aqy ikqy ies qoN ault ho, ikqy iqMnw guxw (rjo, sqo, qmo) qoN pry ho Aqy ikqy ieMnHw guxw nwl sMXukq ho ]4]14]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh reet kahoo(n) taa siau bipreet kahoo(n) tiragun ateet kahoo(n) suragun samet ho ||4||14||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद रीत कहूँ ता सिउ बिप्रीत कहूँ तृगुन अतीत कहूँ सुरगुन समेत हो ॥४॥१४॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد ریِت کهُوں تا سا بپریِت کهُوں ترگن اتیِت کهُوں سُرگن سمےت هو ۔۔۴۔۔۱۴۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM jtwDwrI khUM kMTI Dry bRhmcwrI khUM jog swDI khUM swDnw krq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art a sage wearing matted hair, somewhere Thu art a rosary-wearing celibate, somewhere Thou art a rosary-wearing celibate, somewhere Thou hast practiced Yoga and somewhere Thou art practicing Yoga.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) ikqy qusIN jtwDwrI (swDU) ho Aqy ikqy gl ivc kMTI Dwrn krn vwly bRhmcwrI (rwmwnMdI swDU) ho, ikqy jog nUM swD ilAw hY Aqy ikqy (jog) swDnw kr rhy ho।
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) ikqy qusIN jtwDwrI (swDU) ho Aqy ikqy gl ivc kMTI Dwrn krn vwly bRhmcwrI (rwmwnMdI swDU) ho, ikqy jog nUM swD ilAw hY Aqy ikqy (jog) swDnw kr rhy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) jaTaadhaaree kahoo(n) ka(n)Thee dhare brahamachaaree kahoo(n) jog saadhee kahoo(n) saadhanaa karat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ जटाधारी कहूँ कंठी धरे ब्रहमचारी कहूँ जोग साधी कहूँ साधना करत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں جٹادھاریِ کهُوں کںٹھیِ دھرے برهمچاریِ کهُوں جوگ سادھیِ کهُوں سادھنا کرت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM kwn Pwry khUM fMfI huie pDwry khUM PUk PUk pwvn kau ipRQI pY Drq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art a Kanphata Yougi and somewhere Thou roamest like a Dandi saint, somewhere Thou steppest on the earth very cautiously.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN kMn pwty jogI ho, ikqy fMfwDwrI (sMinAwsI) ho ky ivcr rhy ho, ikqy PUk PUk ky pYrw nUM DrqI auqy Drn vwly (jYn swDU) ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN kMn pwty jogI ho, ikqy fMfwDwrI (sMinAwsI) ho ky ivcr rhy ho, ikqy PUk PUk ky pYrw nUM DrqI auqy Drn vwly (jYn swDU) ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) kaan faare kahoo(n) dda(n)ddee hui padhaare kahoo(n) fook fook paavan kau pirathee pai dharat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ कान फारे कहूँ डंडी हुइ पधारे कहूँ फूक फूक पावन कउ पृथी पै धरत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں کان پھارے کهُوں ڈںڈیِ هُا پدھارے کهُوں پھُوک پھُوک پاون کا پرتھیِ پَے دھرت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM ispwhI huie kY swDq islwhn kO khUM CqRI huie kY Ar mwrq mrq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere becoming a soldier, Thou practisest arms and somewhere becoming a kshatriya, Thou slayest the enemy or be slayed Thyself.

pu.ss: ikqy ispwhI ho ky SsqRw ('islwhn') dw AiBAws kr rhy ho Aqy ikqy CqRI (XoDw) rUp ho ky vYrI nUM mwrdy Aqy mrdy ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy ispwhI ho ky SsqRw ('islwhn') dw AiBAws kr rhy ho Aqy ikqy CqRI (XoDw) rUp ho ky vYrI nUM mwrdy Aqy mrdy ho।

transliteration.en: katahoo(n) sipaahee hui kai saadhat silaahan kau kahoo(n) chhatree hui kai ar maarat marat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कतहूँ सिपाही हुइ कै साधत सिलाहन कौ कहूँ छत्री हुइ कै अर मारत मरत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں سپاهیِ هُا کَے سادھت سلاهن کَو کهُوں چھتریِ هُا کَے ار مارت مرت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM BUm Bwr kO auqwrq ho mhwrwj khUM Bv BUqn kI Bwvnw Brq ho ]5]15]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou removest the burden of the earth, O Supreme Sovereign! And somewhere Thou the wishes of the worldly beings. 5.15.

pu.ss: ikqy mhwrwjy dw rUp Dwr ky DrqI auproN zulm dy Bwr nUM auqwrdy ho Aqy ikqy jgq dy jIvw dI ie`Cw nUM pUrw krdy ho ]5]15]
pu.bdb: ikqy mhwrwjy dw rUp Dwr ky DrqI auproN zulm dy Bwr nUM auqwrdy ho Aqy ikqy jgq dy jIvw dI ie`Cw nUM pUrw krdy ho ]5]15]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bhoom bhaar kau utaarat ho mahaaraaj kahoo(n) bhav bhootan kee bhaavanaa bharat ho ||5||15||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ भूम भार कौ उतारत हो महाराज कहूँ भव भूतन की भावना भरत हो ॥५॥१५॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بھُوم بھار کَو اُتارت هو مهاراج کهُوں بھو بھُوتن کیِ بھاونا بھرت هو ۔۔۵۔۔۱۵۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM gIq nwd ky indwn kO bqwvq ho khUM inRqkwrI icqRkwrI ky inDwn ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou elucidatest the traits of song and sound and somewhere Thou art the treasure of dancing and painting.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN gIq Aqy nwd dy FMgw ('indwn') nUM dsx vwly ho Aqy ikqy nwc klw Aqy ic`qrklw dy BMfwr ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN gIq Aqy nwd dy FMgw ('indwn') nUM dsx vwly ho Aqy ikqy nwc klw Aqy ic`qrklw dy BMfwr ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) geet naadh ke nidhaan kau bataavat ho kahoo(n) niratakaaree chitrakaaree ke nidhaan ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ गीत नाद के निदान कौ बतावत हो कहूँ नृतकारी चित्रकारी के निधान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں گیِت ناد کے ندان کَو بتاوت هو کهُوں نرتکاریِ چترکاریِ کے ندھان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kqhUM pXUK huie kY pIvq ipvwvq ho kqhUM mXUK aUK khUM md pwn ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art ambrosia which Thou drinkest and causest to drink, somewhere Thou art honey and sugarcane juice and somewhere Thou seemest intoxicated with wine.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN AMimRq AQvw som rs ('pXUK') ho ky (aus nUM) pINdy Aqy iplwdy ho Aqy ikqy qusIN mwKIauW Aqy ikqy gMny dw rs ho Aqy ikqy midrw dw pwn krn vwly ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN AMimRq AQvw som rs ('pXUK') ho ky (aus nUM) pINdy Aqy iplwdy ho Aqy ikqy qusIN mwKIauW Aqy ikqy gMny dw rs ho Aqy ikqy midrw dw pwn krn vwly ho।

transliteration.en: katahoo(n) payookh hui kai peevat pivaavat ho katahoo(n) mayookh uookh kahoo(n) madh paan ho ||
transliteration.hi: कतहूँ पयूख हुइ कै पीवत पिवावत हो कतहूँ मयूख ऊख कहूँ मद पान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کتهُوں پےُوکھ هُا کَے پیِوت پواوت هو کتهُوں مےُوکھ اُوکھ کهُوں مد پان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM mhw sUr huie kY mwrq mvwsn kO khUM mhwdyv dyvqwn ky smwn ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere, becoming a great warrior Thou slayeth the enemies and somewhere Thou art like the chief gods.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN mhwn sUrmy bx ky bwZIAW ('mvwsn') nUM mwrdy ho Aqy ikqy qusIN dyviqAW dy vI mhw dyv vrgy ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN mhwn sUrmy bx ky bwZIAW ('mvwsn') nUM mwrdy ho Aqy ikqy qusIN dyviqAW dy vI mhw dyv vrgy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) mahaa soor hui kai maarat mavaasan kau kahoo(n) mahaadhev dhevataan ke samaan ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ महा सूर हुइ कै मारत मवासन कौ कहूँ महादेव देवतान के समान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں مها سُور هُا کَے مارت مواسن کَو کهُوں مهادےو دےوتان کے سمان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM mhwdIn khUM dRb ky ADIn khUM ibidAw mY pRbIn khUM BUm khUM Bwn ho ]6]16]

en.bdb: Somewhere thou art very humble, somewhere Thou art full of ego, somewhere Thou art an adept in learning, somewhere Thou art earth and somewhere Thou art the sun. 6.16.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN Aiq kMgwl ho Aqy ikqy DnwF ho, ikqy ividAw ivc pRbIn ho Aqy ikqy DrqI Aqy ikqy sUrj ho ]6]16]
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN Aiq kMgwl ho Aqy ikqy DnwF ho, ikqy ividAw ivc pRbIn ho Aqy ikqy DrqI Aqy ikqy sUrj ho ]6]16]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) mahaadheen kahoo(n) dhrab ke adheen kahoo(n) bidhiaa mai prabeen kahoo(n) bhoom kahoo(n) bhaan ho ||6||16||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ महादीन कहूँ द्रब के अधीन कहूँ बिदिआ मै प्रबीन कहूँ भूम कहूँ भान हो ॥६॥१६॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں مهادیٍن کهُوں درب کے ادھیٍن کهُوں بدآ مَے پربیٍن کهُوں بھُوم کهُوں بھان هو ۔۔۶۔۔۱۶۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM AklMk khUM mwrq mXMk khUM pUrn pRjMk khUM s`uDqw kI swr ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art without any blemish, somewhere Thou smitest the moon, somewhere Thou art completely engrossed in enjoyment on Thy couch and somewhere Thou art the essence of Purity.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) qusIN ikqy klMk qoN ibnw ho Aqy ikqy cMdRmw ('mXMk') nUM mwrn vwly (klMikq krn vwly goqm irSI) ho, ikqy qusIN iesqrI sihq plMG vwly (igRhsqI) ho Aqy ikqy qusIN Su`Dqw dw swr-q`qÍ ho (ArQwq suK suivDw qoN pry ho)
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) qusIN ikqy klMk qoN ibnw ho Aqy ikqy cMdRmw ('mXMk') nUM mwrn vwly (klMikq krn vwly goqm irSI) ho, ikqy qusIN iesqrI sihq plMG vwly (igRhsqI) ho Aqy ikqy qusIN Su`Dqw dw swr-q`qÍ ho (ArQwq suK suivDw qoN pry ho)

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) akala(n)k kahoo(n) maarat maya(n)k kahoo(n) pooran praja(n)k kahoo(n) sa'udhataa kee saar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ अकलंक कहूँ मारत मयंक कहूँ पूरन प्रजंक कहूँ सु्ुधता की सार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں اکلںک کهُوں مارت مےںک کهُوں پُورن پرجںک کهُوں سّدھتا کیِ سار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM dyv Drm khUM swDnw ky hrm khUM kuqsq kukrm khUM Drm ky pRkwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou performest godly rituals, somewhere Thou art the Abode of religious discipline, somewhere Thou art the vicious actions and somewhere Thou art the vicious actions and somewhere Thou appearest in variety of virtuous acts.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN dyv-DrmI ho Aqy ikqy vsIilAW (swDnw) dy mh`l (BMfwr) ho, ikqy inMdwXog kukrm (krn vwly) ho Aqy ikqy Drm dy Anyk FMg ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN dyv-DrmI ho Aqy ikqy vsIilAW (swDnw) dy mh`l (BMfwr) ho, ikqy inMdwXog kukrm (krn vwly) ho Aqy ikqy Drm dy Anyk FMg ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) dhev dharam kahoo(n) saadhanaa ke haram kahoo(n) kutasat kukaram kahoo(n) dharam ke prakaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ देव धरम कहूँ साधना के हरम कहूँ कुतसत कुकरम कहूँ धरम के प्रकार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں دےو دھرم کهُوں سادھنا کے هرم کهُوں کُتست کُکرم کهُوں دھرم کے پرکار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM paun AhwrI khUM ibidAw ky bIcwrI khUM jogI jqI bRhmcwrI nr khUM nwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou subsistest on air, somewhere Thou art a learned thinker and somewhere Thou art a Yogi, a Celibate, a Brahmchari ( disciplined student), a man and a womean.

pu.ss: ikqy pOx dw Awhwr krn vwly ho, ikqy ividAw dw ivcwr krn vwly (ivdvwn) ho, ikqy jogI, jqI, bRhmcwrI, purS Aqy nwrI ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy pOx dw Awhwr krn vwly ho, ikqy ividAw dw ivcwr krn vwly (ivdvwn) ho, ikqy jogI, jqI, bRhmcwrI, purS Aqy nwrI ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) paun ahaaree kahoo(n) bidhiaa ke beechaaree kahoo(n) jogee jatee brahamachaaree nar kahoo(n) naar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ पउन अहारी कहूँ बिदिआ के बीचारी कहूँ जोगी जती ब्रहमचारी नर कहूँ नार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں پان اهاریِ کهُوں بدآ کے بیِچاریِ کهُوں جوگیِ جتیِ برهمچاریِ نر کهُوں نار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM CqRDwrI khUM Cwlw Dry CYl BwrI khUM CkvwrI khUM Cl ky pRkwr ho ]7]17]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art a mighty sovereign, somewhere Thou art a great preceptor sitting on a deer-skin, somewhere Thou art prone to be deceived and somewhere Thou art various types of deception Thyself. 7.17.

pu.ss: ikqy CqRDwrI (rwjy) imRgCwlw-DwrI (sMinAwsI) ho, ikqy bhuq suMdr nOjvwn Aqy ikqy inrbl SrIr vwly ('CkvwrI') Aqy ikqy Cl dy Anyk rUp ho ]7]17]
pu.bdb: ikqy CqRDwrI (rwjy) imRgCwlw-DwrI (sMinAwsI) ho, ikqy bhuq suMdr nOjvwn Aqy ikqy inrbl SrIr vwly ('CkvwrI') Aqy ikqy Cl dy Anyk rUp ho ]7]17]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) chhatradhaaree kahoo(n) chhaalaa dhare chhail bhaaree kahoo(n) chhakavaaree kahoo(n) chhal ke prakaar ho ||7||17||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ छत्रधारी कहूँ छाला धरे छैल भारी कहूँ छकवारी कहूँ छल के प्रकार हो ॥७॥१७॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں چھتردھاریِ کهُوں چھالا دھرے چھَےل بھاریِ کهُوں چھکواریِ کهُوں چھل کے پرکار هو ۔۔۷۔۔۱۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM gIq ky gv`Xw khUM byn ky bj`Xw khUM inRq ky nc`Xw khUM nr ko Akwr ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art singer of song somewhere Thou art player of flute, somewhere Thou art a dancer and somewhere in the form of a man.

pu.ss: ikqy gIqw dy gwx vwly ho, ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly ho, ikqy nwc dy ncwr ho Aqy ikqy nr srUp vwly ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy gIqw dy gwx vwly ho, ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly ho, ikqy nwc dy ncwr ho Aqy ikqy nr srUp vwly ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) geet ke gava'yaa kahoo(n) ben ke baja'yaa kahoo(n) nirat ke nacha'yaa kahoo(n) nar ko akaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ गीत के गवय्या कहूँ बेन के बजय्या कहूँ नृत के नचय्या कहूँ नर को अकार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں گیِت کے گوّےا کهُوں بےن کے بجّےا کهُوں نرت کے نچّےا کهُوں نر کو اکار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd bwnI khUM kok kI khwnI khUM rwjw khUM rwnI khUM nwr ky pRkwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the vedic hymns and somewhere the story of the elucidator of the mystery of love,  somewhere Thou art Thyself the king, the queen and also various types of woman.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN vyd-bwxI ho, ikqy kwm dy Bydw dw ibR`qwq ho, ikqy rwjy ho, ikqy rwxI ho Aqy ikqy qusIN iesqrI dy v`K v`K srUp ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN vyd-bwxI ho, ikqy kwm dy Bydw dw ibR`qwq ho, ikqy rwjy ho, ikqy rwxI ho Aqy ikqy qusIN iesqrI dy v`K v`K srUp ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh baanee kahoo(n) kok kee kahaanee kahoo(n) raajaa kahoo(n) raanee kahoo(n) naar ke prakaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद बानी कहूँ कोक की कहानी कहूँ राजा कहूँ रानी कहूँ नार के प्रकार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد بانیِ کهُوں کوک کیِ کهانیِ کهُوں راجا کهُوں رانیِ کهُوں نار کے پرکار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byn ky bj`Xw khUM Dyn ky cr`Xw khUM lwKn lv`Xw khUM suMdr kumwr ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the player of flute, somewhere the grazier of cows and somewhere Thou art the beautiful youth, enticer of lakhs (of lovely maids.)

pu.ss: ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly, ikqy gaUAW nUM crwaux vwly, ikqy (ivArQ dIAW) qohmqw lgvwaux vwly Aqy ikqy suMdr kumwr ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy bMsrI vjwaux vwly, ikqy gaUAW nUM crwaux vwly, ikqy (ivArQ dIAW) qohmqw lgvwaux vwly Aqy ikqy suMdr kumwr ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) ben ke baja'yaa kahoo(n) dhen ke chara'yaa kahoo(n) laakhan lava'yaa kahoo(n) su(n)dhar kumaar ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेन के बजय्या कहूँ धेन के चरय्या कहूँ लाखन लवय्या कहूँ सुँदर कुमार हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےن کے بجّےا کهُوں دھےن کے چرّےا کهُوں لاکھن لوّےا کهُوں سُںدر کُمار هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: suDqw kI swn ho ik sMqn ky pRwn ho ik dwqw mhw dwn ho ik inRdoKI inrMkwr ho ]8]18]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art the splendour of Purity, the life of the saints, the Donor of great charities and the immaculate Formless Lord. 8.18.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN pivqrqw dI Swn ho, jw sMqw dy pRwx ho jw mhwn dwn dyx vwly dwnI ho jw inrdoS inrwkwr ho ]8]18]
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN pivqrqw dI Swn ho, jw sMqw dy pRwx ho jw mhwn dwn dyx vwly dwnI ho jw inrdoS inrwkwr ho ]8]18]

transliteration.en: sudhataa kee saan ho k sa(n)tan ke praan ho k dhaataa mahaa dhaan ho k niradhokhee nira(n)kaar ho ||8||18||
transliteration.hi: सुधता की सान हो कि संतन के प्रान हो कि दाता महा दान हो कि नृदोखी निरंकार हो ॥८॥१८॥
transliteration.ur: سُدھتا کیِ سان هو ک سںتن کے پران هو ک داتا مها دان هو ک نردوکھیِ نرںکار هو ۔۔۸۔۔۱۸۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: inrjur inrUp ho ik suMdr srUp ho ik BUpn ky BUp ho ik dwqw mhw dwn ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Thou art the Invisible Cataract, the Most Beautiful Entity, the King of Kings and the Donor of great charities.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU!) qusIN inrog Aqy ArUp ho jw suMdr srUp vwly ho, jw rwijAW dy rwjy ho jw mhwn dwn krn vwly dwnI ho।
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU!) qusIN inrog Aqy ArUp ho jw suMdr srUp vwly ho, jw rwijAW dy rwjy ho jw mhwn dwn krn vwly dwnI ho।

transliteration.en: nirajur niroop ho k su(n)dhar saroop ho k bhoopan ke bhoop ho k dhaataa mahaa dhaan ho ||
transliteration.hi: निरजुर निरूप हो कि सुँदर सरूप हो कि भूपन के भूप हो कि दाता महा दान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: نِرجر نرُوپ هو ک سُںدر سرُوپ هو ک بھُوپن کے بھُوپ هو ک داتا مها دان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pRwn ky bc`Xw dUD pUq ky idv`Xw rog sog ky imt`Xw ikDO mwnI mhw mwn ho ]

en.bdb: Thou art the Saviour of life, the Giver of milk and offspring, the Remover of ailments and sufferings and somewhere Thou art the Lord of Highest Honour.

pu.ss: qusIN pRwxw dI riKAW krn vwly ho jw du`D pu`qr bKSx vwly ho jw rog Aqy sog nUM imtwaux vwly ho jw v`fy AiBmwn vwly AiBmwnI ho।
pu.bdb: qusIN pRwxw dI riKAW krn vwly ho jw du`D pu`qr bKSx vwly ho jw rog Aqy sog nUM imtwaux vwly ho jw v`fy AiBmwn vwly AiBmwnI ho।

transliteration.en: praan ke bacha'yaa dhoodh poot ke dhiva'yaa rog sog ke miTa'yaa kidhau maanee mahaa maan ho ||
transliteration.hi: प्रान के बचय्या दूध पूत के दिवय्या रोग सोग के मिटय्या किधौ मानी महा मान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: پران کے بچّےا دُودھ پُوت کے دوّےا روگ سوگ کے مٹّےا کدھَو مانیِ مها مان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ibidAw ky ibcwr ho ik AdÍY Avqwr ho ik is`Dqw kI sUriq ho ik suDqw kI swn ho ]

en.bdb: Thou art the essence of all learning, the embodiment of monism, the Being of All-Powers and the Glory of Sanctification.

pu.ss: qusIN ividAw dw ivcwr (ivdvwn) ho jw AdÍYq-srUp vwly ho, jw is`DIAW dI pRiqmUrqI ho, jw Su`Dqw dw gOrv ho।
pu.bdb: qusIN ividAw dw ivcwr (ivdvwn) ho jw AdÍYq-srUp vwly ho, jw is`DIAW dI pRiqmUrqI ho, jw Su`Dqw dw gOrv ho।

transliteration.en: bidhiaa ke bichaar ho k adhavai avataar ho k si'dhataa kee soorat ho k sudhataa kee saan ho ||
transliteration.hi: बिदिआ के बिचार हो कि अद्वै अवतार हो कि सिद्धता की सूरति हो कि सुधता की सान हो ॥
transliteration.ur: بِدآ کے بچار هو ک ادوَے اوتار هو ک سّدھتا کیِ سُورت هو ک سُدھتا کیِ سان هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jobn ky jwl ho ik kwl hUM ky kwl ho ik sqRn ky sUl ho ik imqRn ky pRwn ho ]9]19]

en.bdb: Thou art the snare of youth, the Death of Death, the anguish of enemies and the life of the friends. 9.19.

pu.ss: qusIN jvwnI dy jwl (AwkriSq kr ky moh bMDn ivc Pswaux vwly) ho, jw kwl dy vI kwl ho, jw vYrIAW leI pIVwkwrI ho, jw imqrw leI pRwx-rUp ho ]9]19]
pu.bdb: qusIN jvwnI dy jwl (AwkriSq kr ky moh bMDn ivc Pswaux vwly) ho, jw kwl dy vI kwl ho, jw vYrIAW leI pIVwkwrI ho, jw imqrw leI pRwx-rUp ho ]9]19]

transliteration.en: joban ke jaal ho k kaal hoo(n) ke kaal ho k satran ke sool ho k mitran ke praan ho ||9||19||
transliteration.hi: जोबन के जाल हो कि काल हूँ के काल हो कि सत्रन के सूल हो कि मित्रन के प्रान हो ॥९॥१९॥
transliteration.ur: جوبن کے جال هو ک کال هُوں کے کال هو ک سترن کے سُول هو ک مترن کے پران هو ۔۔۹۔۔۱۹۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM bRhm bwd khUM ibidAw ko ibKwd khUM nwd ko nnwd khUM pUrn Bgq ho ]

en.bdb: O Lord! Somewhere Thou art in defic conduct, somewhere Thou appearest as contention in learning somewhere Thou art the tune of sound and somewhere a perfect saint (attuned with celestial strain).

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN bRhm sMbMDI ivcwr-crcw ho, jw ividAw dy qrk-ivqrk ho, jw ikqy Anhd nwd dI Dun ho, jw ikqy (Anhd nwd dI Dun ivc) pUrI qrRhw lIn Bgq ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN bRhm sMbMDI ivcwr-crcw ho, jw ividAw dy qrk-ivqrk ho, jw ikqy Anhd nwd dI Dun ho, jw ikqy (Anhd nwd dI Dun ivc) pUrI qrRhw lIn Bgq ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) braham baadh kahoo(n) bidhiaa ko bikhaadh kahoo(n) naadh ko nanaadh kahoo(n) pooran bhagat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ ब्रहम बाद कहूँ बिदिआ को बिखाद कहूँ नाद को ननाद कहूँ पूरन भगत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں برهم باد کهُوں بدآ کو بکھاد کهُوں ناد کو نناد کهُوں پُورن بھگت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM byd rIq khUM ibidAw kI pRqIq khUM nIq Aau AnIq khUM juAwlw sI jgq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art Vedic ritual, somewhere the love for learning, somewhere ethical and unethical, and somewhere appearest as the glow of fire.

pu.ss: ikqy qusIN vyd-rIq dy pwlk ho, ikqy ividAw dI pRqIqI (ivSvws) ho, ikqy nIqI ho Aqy ikqy AnIqI ho Aqy ikqy A`g vwg cmkdy ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy qusIN vyd-rIq dy pwlk ho, ikqy ividAw dI pRqIqI (ivSvws) ho, ikqy nIqI ho Aqy ikqy AnIqI ho Aqy ikqy A`g vwg cmkdy ho।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bedh reet kahoo(n) bidhiaa kee prateet kahoo(n) neet aau aneet kahoo(n) juaalaa see jagat ho ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बेद रीत कहूँ बिदिआ की प्रतीत कहूँ नीत अउ अनीत कहूँ जुआला सी जगत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بےد ریِت کهُوں بدآ کیِ پرتیِت کهُوں نیِت اا انیِت کهُوں جُآلا سیِ جگت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pUrn pRqwp khUM iekwqI ko jwp khUM qwp ko Aqwp khUM jog qy ifgq ho ]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou art perfectly Glorious, somewhere engrossed in solitary recitation, somewhere Remover of Suffering in great Agony and somewhere Thou appearest as a fallen yogi.

pu.ss: ikqy pUrn pRqwp vwly ho, ikqy eykwq-vwsI (swDk) dy jwp ho, ikqy qpisAw (duAwrw pRwpq nw kIqy jw skx vwly) Akwl purK (Aqwp) ho Aqy ikqy jog-swDnw qoN ifgx vwly ho।
pu.bdb: ikqy pUrn pRqwp vwly ho, ikqy eykwq-vwsI (swDk) dy jwp ho, ikqy qpisAw (duAwrw pRwpq nw kIqy jw skx vwly) Akwl purK (Aqwp) ho Aqy ikqy jog-swDnw qoN ifgx vwly ho।

transliteration.en: pooran prataap kahoo(n) ikaatee ko jaap kahoo(n) taap ko ataap kahoo(n) jog te ddigat ho ||
transliteration.hi: पूरन प्रताप कहूँ इकाती को जाप कहूँ ताप को अताप कहूँ जोग ते डिगत हो ॥
transliteration.ur: پُورن پرتاپ کهُوں اکاتیِ کو جاپ کهُوں تاپ کو اتاپ کهُوں جوگ تے ڈگت هو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM br dyq khUM Cl isau iCnwie lyq srb kwl srb Taur eyk sy lgq ho ]10]20]

en.bdb: Somewhere Thou bestowest the Boon and somewhere withdraw it with deceit. Thou at all times and at all the places Thou comest into view as the same. 10.20.

pu.ss: ikqy vr dyx vwly ho ikqy Cl nwl Koh lYx vwly ho, (mYnUM) sB simAW ivc Aqy sBnw iTkwixAW ivc iek-smwn pRqIq huMdy ho ]10]20]
pu.bdb: ikqy vr dyx vwly ho ikqy Cl nwl Koh lYx vwly ho, (mYnUM) sB simAW ivc Aqy sBnw iTkwixAW ivc iek-smwn pRqIq huMdy ho ]10]20]

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) bar dhet kahoo(n) chhal siau chhinai let sarab kaal sarab Thaur ek se lagat ho ||10||20||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ बर देत कहूँ छल सिउ छिनाइ लेत सरब काल सरब ठउर एक से लगत हो ॥१०॥२०॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں بر دےت کهُوں چھل سا چھناا لےت سرب کال سرب ٹھار اےک سے لگت هو ۔۔۱۰۔۔۲۰۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qÍ pRswid ] sv`Xy ]

en.bdb: BY THY GRACE SWAYYAS

pu.ss: qyrI ikRpw nwl: sÍYXy:
pu.bdb: qyrI ikRpw nwl: sÍYXy:

transliteration.en: tavai prasaadh || sava'ye ||
transliteration.hi: त्व प्रसादि ॥ सवय्ये ॥
transliteration.ur: تو پرساد ۔۔ سوّےے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sRwvg su`D smUh isDwn ky dyiK iPirE Gr jog jqI ky ]

en.bdb: I have seen during my tours pure Sravaks (Jaina and Buddhist monks), group of adepts and abodes of ascetics and Yogi.

pu.ss: (hy pRBU! mYN) bu`D Aqy jYn mq nUM mMnx vwly SRwvkw, krmkwfIAW, is`Dw, jogIAW Aqy jqIAW dy is`Dwiqk ivcwrw (Grw) nUM GoK ilAw hY;
pu.bdb: (hy pRBU! mYN) bu`D Aqy jYn mq nUM mMnx vwly SRwvkw, krmkwfIAW, is`Dw, jogIAW Aqy jqIAW dy is`Dwiqk ivcwrw (Grw) nUM GoK ilAw hY;

transliteration.en: sraavag su'dh samooh sidhaan ke dhekh firio ghar jog jatee ke ||
transliteration.hi: स्रावग सुद्ध समूह सिधान के देखि फिरिओ घर जोग जती के ॥
transliteration.ur: سراوگ سُّدھ سمُوه سدھان کے دےکھ پھراو گھر جوگ جتیِ کے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sUr surwrdn su`D suDwidk sMq smUh Anyk mqI ky ]

en.bdb: Valiant heroes, demons killing gods, gods drinking nectar and assemblies of saints of various sects.

pu.ss: SUrvIrw, (dyviqAW dy vYrI) dYNqw Aqy Su`D AMimRq (suDw) pwn krn vwly dyviqAW Aqy Anyk pRkwr dy sMqw dIAW mMflIAW nUM (qur iPr ky vyK ilAw hY);
pu.bdb: SUrvIrw, (dyviqAW dy vYrI) dYNqw Aqy Su`D AMimRq (suDw) pwn krn vwly dyviqAW Aqy Anyk pRkwr dy sMqw dIAW mMflIAW nUM (qur iPr ky vyK ilAw hY);

transliteration.en: soor suraaradhan su'dh sudhaadhik sa(n)t samooh anek matee ke ||
transliteration.hi: सूर सुरारदन सुद्ध सुधादिक संत समूह अनेक मती के ॥
transliteration.ur: سُور سُراردن سُّدھ سُدھادک سںت سمُوه انےک متیِ کے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: swry hI dys ko dyiK rihE mq koaU n dyKIAq pRwnpqI ky ]

en.bdb: I have seen the disciplines of the religious systems of all the countries, but seen none of the Lord, the Master of my life.

pu.ss: swirAW dysw dy mq-mqwqrw nUM vyK ilAw hY pr koeI vI Aijhw nhIN vyiKAw jo (s`cy ArQw ivc) prmwqmw dw bixAw hovy (ArQwq AiDAwqimk krq`v pRiq sucyq hovy)।
pu.bdb: swirAW dysw dy mq-mqwqrw nUM vyK ilAw hY pr koeI vI Aijhw nhIN vyiKAw jo (s`cy ArQw ivc) prmwqmw dw bixAw hovy (ArQwq AiDAwqimk krq`v pRiq sucyq hovy)।

transliteration.en: saare hee dhes ko dhekh rahio mat kouoo na dhekheeat praanapatee ke ||
transliteration.hi: सारे ही देस को देखि रहिओ मत कोऊ न देखीअत प्रानपती के ॥
transliteration.ur: سارے هیِ دےس کو دےکھ رهِاو مت کواُو ن دےکھیِات پرانپتیِ کے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sRI Bgvwn kI Bwie ikRpw hU qy eyk rqI ibnu eyk rqI ky ]1]21]

en.bdb: They are worth nothing without an iota of the Grace of the Lord. 1.21.

pu.ss: (sc qw ieh hY ik) prmwqmw dI ikRpw dI Bwvnw Aqy iek mwqr pRIq (rqI qoN ibnw) (ieh swry) iek rqI dy vI nhIN hn (ArQwq qu`C hn) ]1]21]
pu.bdb: (sc qw ieh hY ik) prmwqmw dI ikRpw dI Bwvnw Aqy iek mwqr pRIq (rqI qoN ibnw) (ieh swry) iek rqI dy vI nhIN hn (ArQwq qu`C hn) ]1]21]

transliteration.en: sree bhagavaan kee bhai kirapaa hoo te ek ratee bin ek ratee ke ||1||21||
transliteration.hi: स्री भगवान की भाइ कृपा हू ते एक रती बिनु एक रती के ॥१॥२१॥
transliteration.ur: سریِ بھگوان کیِ بھاا کرپا هُو تے اےک رتیِ بن اےک رتیِ کے ۔۔۱۔۔۲۱۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mwqy mqMg jry jr sMg AnUp auqMg surMg svwry ]

en.bdb: With intoxicated elephants, studded with gold, incomparable and huge, painted in bright colours.

pu.ss: sony nwl jVHy hoey, au`cy Akwr pRkwr vwly sMDUr nwl sMvwry hoey AnUpm msq hwQI hox;
pu.bdb: sony nwl jVHy hoey, au`cy Akwr pRkwr vwly sMDUr nwl sMvwry hoey AnUpm msq hwQI hox;

transliteration.en: maate mata(n)g jare jar sa(n)g anoop uta(n)g sura(n)g savaare ||
transliteration.hi: माते मतंग जरे जर संग अनूप उतंग सुरंग सवारे ॥
transliteration.ur: ماتے متںگ جرے جر سںگ انُوپ اُتںگ سُرںگ سوارے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kot qurMg kurMg sy kUdq paun ky gaun ko jwq invwry ]

en.bdb: With millions of horses galloping like deer, moving faster than the wind.

pu.ss: ihrnw vwg kudx Aqy pOx dI qyzI nUM vI ipCy C`fx vwly kroVw GoVy hox;
pu.bdb: ihrnw vwg kudx Aqy pOx dI qyzI nUM vI ipCy C`fx vwly kroVw GoVy hox;

transliteration.en: koT tura(n)g kura(n)g se koodhat paun ke gaun ko jaat nivaare ||
transliteration.hi: कोट तुरंग कुरंग से कूदत पउन के गउन को जात निवारे ॥
transliteration.ur: کوٹ تُرںگ کُرںگ سے کُودت پان کے گان کو جات نوارے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: BwrI Bujwn ky BUp BlI ibiD inAwvq sIs n jwq ibcwry ]

en.bdb: With many kings indescribable, having long arms (of heavy allied forces), bowing their heads in fine array.

pu.ss: (duAwr 'qy KVy) v`fIAW Bujwvw vwly rwjy cMgI qrHw nwl isr invwauWdy hox, ijnHw dI ik igxqI vI nw kIqy jw skdI hovy;
pu.bdb: (duAwr 'qy KVy) v`fIAW Bujwvw vwly rwjy cMgI qrHw nwl isr invwauWdy hox, ijnHw dI ik igxqI vI nw kIqy jw skdI hovy;

transliteration.en: bhaaree bhujaan ke bhoop bhalee bidh niaavat sees na jaat bichaare ||
transliteration.hi: भारी भुजान के भूप भली बिधि निआवत सीस न जात बिचारे ॥
transliteration.ur: بھاریِ بھُجان کے بھُوپ بھلیِ بدھ نآوت سیِس ن جات بچارے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: eyqy Bey qu khw Bey BUpiq AMq ko nWgy hI pWie pDwry ]2]22]

en.bdb: What matters if such mighty emperors were there, because they had to leave the world with bare feet.2.22.

pu.ss: Aijhy (pRqwpI) rwjw bx gey, qw kI hoieAw, (ikauWik) AMq ivc qw nMgy pYrIN hI (ies sMswr qoN) jwxw huMdw hY ]2]22]
pu.bdb: Aijhy (pRqwpI) rwjw bx gey, qw kI hoieAw, (ikauWik) AMq ivc qw nMgy pYrIN hI (ies sMswr qoN) jwxw huMdw hY ]2]22]

transliteration.en: ete bhe ta kahaa bhe bhoopat a(n)t ko naa(n)ge hee paa(n)i padhaare ||2||22||
transliteration.hi: एते भए तु कहा भए भूपति अंत को नाँगे ही पाँइ पधारे ॥२॥२२॥
transliteration.ur: اےتے بھاے تُ کها بھاے بھُوپت اںت کو ناںگے هیِ پاںا پدھارے ۔۔۲۔۔۲۲۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jIq iPrY sB dys idswn ko bwjq Fol imRdMg ngwry ]

en.bdb: With the beat of drums and trumpets if the emperor conquers all the countries.

pu.ss: (ijnHw ny) swry dys-dyswqrw nUM ijq ilAw hovy Aqy ijnHw dy (rwjmh`l Agy) Fol, imRdMg Aqy ngwry vjdy hox;
pu.bdb: (ijnHw ny) swry dys-dyswqrw nUM ijq ilAw hovy Aqy ijnHw dy (rwjmh`l Agy) Fol, imRdMg Aqy ngwry vjdy hox;

transliteration.en: jeet firai sabh dhes dhisaan ko baajat ddol miradha(n)g nagaare ||
transliteration.hi: जीत फिरै सभ देस दिसान को बाजत ढोल मृदंग नगारे ॥
transliteration.ur: جیِت پھرَے سبھ دےس دسان کو باجت ڈھول مردںگ نگارے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: guMjq gUV gjwn ky suMdr ihMsq hYN hXrwj hjwry ]

en.bdb: Along with many beautiful roaring elephants and thousands of neighing houses of best breed.

pu.ss: suMdr hwQIAW dy smUh icMGwVdy hox Aqy hzwrw hI sRyST GoVy ihxkdy hox;
pu.bdb: suMdr hwQIAW dy smUh icMGwVdy hox Aqy hzwrw hI sRyST GoVy ihxkdy hox;

transliteration.en: gu(n)jat gooR gajaan ke su(n)dhar hi(n)sat hai(n) hayaraaj hajaare ||
transliteration.hi: गुँजत गूड़ गजान के सुँदर हिंसत हैं हयराज हजारे ॥
transliteration.ur: گُںجت گُوڑ گجان کے سُںدر هںست هَےں هےراج هجارے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: BUq Biv`K Bvwn ky BUpq kaunu gnY nhIN jwq ibcwry ]

en.bdb: Such like emperors of the past, present and future cannot be counted and ascertained.

pu.ss: (Aijhy mh`qv vwly) BUq, BivK Aqy vrqmwn iqMnw kwlw ivc ieqny rwjy hoey hn ik ijnHw nUM ivcwirAw nhIN jw skdw (ArQwq Axigxq hn);
pu.bdb: (Aijhy mh`qv vwly) BUq, BivK Aqy vrqmwn iqMnw kwlw ivc ieqny rwjy hoey hn ik ijnHw nUM ivcwirAw nhIN jw skdw (ArQwq Axigxq hn);

transliteration.en: bhoot bhavi'kh bhavaan ke bhoopat kaun ganai nahee(n) jaat bichaare ||
transliteration.hi: भूत भविक्ख भवान के भूपत कउनु गनै नहीं जात बिचारे ॥
transliteration.ur: بھُوت بھوّکھ بھوان کے بھُوپت کان گنَے نهیِں جات بچارے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sRI piq sRI Bgvwn Bjy ibnu AMq kau AMq ky Dwm isDwry ]3]23]

en.bdb: But without remembering the Name of the Lord, they ultimately leave for their final abode. 3.23.

pu.ss: pr mwieAw dy suAwmI pRBU dy ismrn qoN ibnw AMq nUM Xmrwj dy Gr cly gey hn ]3]23]
pu.bdb: pr mwieAw dy suAwmI pRBU dy ismrn qoN ibnw AMq nUM Xmrwj dy Gr cly gey hn ]3]23]

transliteration.en: sree pat sree bhagavaan bhaje bin a(n)t kau a(n)t ke dhaam sidhaare ||3||23||
transliteration.hi: स्री पति स्री भगवान भजे बिनु अंत कउ अंत के धाम सिधारे ॥३॥२३॥
transliteration.ur: سریِ پت سریِ بھگوان بھجے بن اںت کا اںت کے دھام سدھارے ۔۔۳۔۔۲۳۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qIrQ nwn dieAw dm dwn su sMjm nym Anyk ibsyKY ]

en.bdb: Taking bath at holy places, exercising mercy, controlling passions, performing acts of charity, practicing austerity and many special rituals.

pu.ss: (jy koeI) qIrQ ieSnwn, dieAw, dwn, (ivkwrw qoN bcx dy) sMjm, nym Aqy hor Anykw ivSyS krm krn vwly;
pu.bdb: (jy koeI) qIrQ ieSnwn, dieAw, dwn, (ivkwrw qoN bcx dy) sMjm, nym Aqy hor Anykw ivSyS krm krn vwly;

transliteration.en: teerath naan dhiaa dham dhaan su sa(n)jam nem anek bisekhai ||
transliteration.hi: तीरथ नान दइआ दम दान सु संजम नेम अनेक बिसेखै ॥
transliteration.ur: تیِرتھ نان دایا دم دان سُ سںجم نےم انےک بسےکھَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: byd purwn kqyb kurwn jmIn jmwn sbwn ky pyKY ]

en.bdb: Studying of Vedas, Puranas and holy Quran and scanning all this world and the next world.

pu.ss: vydw, purwxw, kqybw Aqy kurwn Awid DrqI auqy auplbD swirAW simAW dy (Drm gRMQw nUM) GoKx vwly;
pu.bdb: vydw, purwxw, kqybw Aqy kurwn Awid DrqI auqy auplbD swirAW simAW dy (Drm gRMQw nUM) GoKx vwly;

transliteration.en: bedh puraan kateb kuraan jameen jamaan sabaan ke pekhai ||
transliteration.hi: बेद पुरान कतेब कुरान जमीन जमान सबान के पेखै ॥
transliteration.ur: بےد پُران کتےب کُران جمیٍن جمان سبان کے پےکھَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: paun Ahwr jqI jq Dwr sbY su ibcwr hjwr k dyKY ]

en.bdb: Subsisting only on air, practicing continence and meeting thousands of persons of all good thoughts.

pu.ss: pOx dw Awhwr krn Aqy jq-sq Dwr ky jqI bxn vwly hzwrw hI ivcwr pUrvk vyKy hn;
pu.bdb: pOx dw Awhwr krn Aqy jq-sq Dwr ky jqI bxn vwly hzwrw hI ivcwr pUrvk vyKy hn;

transliteration.en: paun ahaar jatee jat dhaar sabai su bichaar hajaar k dhekhai ||
transliteration.hi: पउन अहार जती जत धार सबै सु बिचार हजार क देखै ॥
transliteration.ur: پان اهار جتیِ جت دھار سبَے سُ بچار هجار ک دےکھَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sRI Bgvwn Bjy ibnu BUpiq eyk rqI ibnu eyk n lyKY ]4]24]

en.bdb: But O King! Without the remembrance of the Name of the Lord, all this is of no account, being without an iota of the Grace of the Lord. 4.24.

pu.ss: pr mwieAw dy suAwmI pRBU dy Bjn Aqy pRym ('rqI') qoN ibnw rwjy vI (prmwqmw dy duAwr qy) pRvwn nhIN hn ]4]24]
pu.bdb: pr mwieAw dy suAwmI pRBU dy Bjn Aqy pRym ('rqI') qoN ibnw rwjy vI (prmwqmw dy duAwr qy) pRvwn nhIN hn ]4]24]

transliteration.en: sree bhagavaan bhaje bin bhoopat ek ratee bin ek na lekhai ||4||24||
transliteration.hi: स्री भगवान भजे बिनु भूपति एक रती बिनु एक न लेखै ॥४॥२४॥
transliteration.ur: سریِ بھگوان بھجے بن بھُوپت اےک رتیِ بن اےک ن لےکھَے ۔۔۴۔۔۲۴۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: s`uD ispwh durMq dubwh su swj snwh durjwn dlYNgy ]

en.bdb: The trained soldiers, mightly and invincible, clad in coat of mail, who would be able to crush the enemies.

pu.ss: cMgI isKI hoeI POj ijs dy swry ispwhIAW (dI SkqI) dw koeI AMq nw hovy Aqy jo kvc sjw ky vYrIAW nUM dlx vwly hox;
pu.bdb: cMgI isKI hoeI POj ijs dy swry ispwhIAW (dI SkqI) dw koeI AMq nw hovy Aqy jo kvc sjw ky vYrIAW nUM dlx vwly hox;

transliteration.en: sa'udh sipaeh dhura(n)t dhubaeh su saaj sanaeh dhurajaan dhalai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: सु्ुध सिपाह दुरंत दुबाह सु साज सनाह दुरजान दलैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: سّدھ سپاه دُرںت دُباه سُ ساج سناه دُرجان دلَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: BwrI gumwn Bry mn mYN kr prbq pMK hly n hlYNgy ]

en.bdb: With great ego in their mind that they would not be vanquished even if the mountains move with wings.

pu.ss: auh (SUrvIr) Awpxy mn ivc BwrI gumwn Brn vwly hox ik prbq BwvyW KMB lw ky (Awpxy sQwn qoN) ihl jwx, (pr auh XoDy rx ivcoN) ihlx vwly nw hox;
pu.bdb: auh (SUrvIr) Awpxy mn ivc BwrI gumwn Brn vwly hox ik prbq BwvyW KMB lw ky (Awpxy sQwn qoN) ihl jwx, (pr auh XoDy rx ivcoN) ihlx vwly nw hox;

transliteration.en: bhaaree gumaan bhare man mai(n) kar parabat pa(n)kh hale na halai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: भारी गुमान भरे मन मैं कर परबत पंख हले न हलैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: بھاریِ گُمان بھرے من مَےں کر پربت پںکھ هلے ن هلَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qoir ArIn mroir mvwsn mwqy mqMgn mwn mlYNgy ]

en.bdb: They would destroy the enemies, twist the rebels and smash the pride of intoxicated elephants.

pu.ss: auh vYrIAW nUM qoVn vwly, bwZIAW nUM mroVn vwly Aqy msq hwQIAW dI msqI nUM ml sutx vwly hox;
pu.bdb: auh vYrIAW nUM qoVn vwly, bwZIAW nUM mroVn vwly Aqy msq hwQIAW dI msqI nUM ml sutx vwly hox;

transliteration.en: tor areen maror mavaasan maate mata(n)gan maan malai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: तोरि अरीन मरोरि मवासन माते मतंगन मान मलैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: تور اریٍن مرور مواسن ماتے متںگن مان ملَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sRI piq sRI Bgvwn ikRpw ibnu iqAwig jhwn indwn clYNgy ]5]25]

en.bdb: But without the Grace of the Lord-God, they would ultimately leave the world. 5.25.

pu.ss: pr mwieAw dy suAwmI prmwqmw dI ikRpw qoN ibnw (Aijhy blvwn sUrmy vI) AMq ivc sMswr nUM iqAwg ky cly jwxgy ]5]25]
pu.bdb: pr mwieAw dy suAwmI prmwqmw dI ikRpw qoN ibnw (Aijhy blvwn sUrmy vI) AMq ivc sMswr nUM iqAwg ky cly jwxgy ]5]25]

transliteration.en: sree pat sree bhagavaan kirapaa bin tiaag jahaan nidhaan chalai(n)ge ||5||25||
transliteration.hi: स्री पति स्री भगवान कृपा बिनु तिआगि जहान निदान चलैंगे ॥५॥२५॥
transliteration.ur: سریِ پت سریِ بھگوان کرپا بن تآگ جهان ندان چلَےںگے ۔۔۵۔۔۲۵۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: bIr Apwr bfy birAwr Aibcwrih swr kI Dwr BC`Xw ]

en.bdb: Innumerable brave and mighty heroes, fearlessly facing the edge of the sword.

pu.ss: Apwr SkqI vwly SUrvIr Aqy bhuq blvwn jo ibnw ivcwry (sMkoc kIqy) SsqRw dI Dwr nUM shwrdy hn;
pu.bdb: Apwr SkqI vwly SUrvIr Aqy bhuq blvwn jo ibnw ivcwry (sMkoc kIqy) SsqRw dI Dwr nUM shwrdy hn;

transliteration.en: beer apaar badde bariaar abichaareh saar kee dhaar bhachha'yaa ||
transliteration.hi: बीर अपार बडे बरिआर अबिचारहि सार की धार भछय्या ॥
transliteration.ur: بیِر اپار بڈے برآر ابِچاره سار کیِ دھار بھچھّےا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qorq dys milMd mvwsn mwqy gjwn ky mwn ml`Xw ]

en.bdb: Conquering the countries, subjugating the rebels and crushing the pride of the intoxicated elephants.

pu.ss: keI dysw nUM qoVdy hn, bwZIAW nUM dl idMdy hn Aqy msq hwQIAW dw hMkwr ml idMdy hn;
pu.bdb: keI dysw nUM qoVdy hn, bwZIAW nUM dl idMdy hn Aqy msq hwQIAW dw hMkwr ml idMdy hn;

transliteration.en: torat dhes mali(n)dh mavaasan maate gajaan ke maan mala'yaa ||
transliteration.hi: तोरत देस मलिंद मवासन माते गजान के मान मलय्या ॥
transliteration.ur: تورت دےس ملںد مواسن ماتے گجان کے مان ملّےا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: gwVHy gVHwn ko qoVnhwr su bwqn hIN ck cwr lv`Xw ]

en.bdb: Capturing the strong forts and conquering all sides with mere threats.

pu.ss: jo idRVH ikilAW nUM qoVn vwly hn Aqy g`lw ivc hI jo cOhw c`kw nUM ijq lYx dI smrQw rKdy hn;
pu.bdb: jo idRVH ikilAW nUM qoVn vwly hn Aqy g`lw ivc hI jo cOhw c`kw nUM ijq lYx dI smrQw rKdy hn;

transliteration.en: gaaRhe gaRhaan ko toRanahaar su baatan hee(n) chak chaar lava'yaa ||
transliteration.hi: गाड़्हे गड़्हान को तोड़नहार सु बातन हीं चक चार लवय्या ॥
transliteration.ur: گاڑھے گڑھان کو توڑنهار سُ باتن هیِں چک چار لوّےا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: swihbu sRI sB ko isrnwiek jwck Anyk su eyk idv`Xw ]6]26]

en.bdb: The Lord God is the Cammander of all and is the only Donor, the beggars are many. 6.26.

pu.ss: pr mwieAw dw suAwmI pRBU aunHw sBnw dw mwlk hY, (aus dy dr qy) ieh swry jwck hn Aqy auh iek hI dyx vwlw hY ]6]26]
pu.bdb: pr mwieAw dw suAwmI pRBU aunHw sBnw dw mwlk hY, (aus dy dr qy) ieh swry jwck hn Aqy auh iek hI dyx vwlw hY ]6]26]

transliteration.en: saahib sree sabh ko siranaik jaachak anek su ek dhiva'yaa ||6||26||
transliteration.hi: साहिबु स्री सभ को सिरनाइक जाचक अनेक सु एक दिवय्या ॥६॥२६॥
transliteration.ur: ساهب سریِ سبھ کو سرنااک جاچک انےک سُ اےک دوّےا ۔۔۶۔۔۲۶۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: dwnv dyv PinMd inswcr BUq BivK Bvwn jpYNgy ]

en.bdb: Demons, gods, huge serpents, ghosts, past, present and future would repeat His Name.

pu.ss: dYNq, dyv qy nwg Aqy rwKS vI ijs nUM iqMnw kwlw (BUq, BivK, vrqmwn) ivc jpdy hn;
pu.bdb: dYNq, dyv qy nwg Aqy rwKS vI ijs nUM iqMnw kwlw (BUq, BivK, vrqmwn) ivc jpdy hn;

transliteration.en: dhaanav dhev fani(n)dh nisaachar bhoot bhavikh bhavaan japai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: दानव देव फनिंद निसाचर भूत भविख भवान जपैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: دانو دےو پھنںد نساچر بھُوت بھوِکھ بھوان جپَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jIv ijqy jl mY Ql mY pl hI pl mY sB Qwp QpYNgy ]

en.bdb: All the creatures in the sea and on land would increase and the heaps of sins would be destroyed.

pu.ss: jo pl hI pl ivc jl-Ql dy swry jIvw dI sQwpnw kr idMdw hY;
pu.bdb: jo pl hI pl ivc jl-Ql dy swry jIvw dI sQwpnw kr idMdw hY;

transliteration.en: jeev jite jal mai thal mai pal hee pal mai sabh thaap thapai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: जीव जिते जल मै थल मै पल ही पल मै सभ थाप थपैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: جیِو جتے جل مَے تھل مَے پل هیِ پل مَے سبھ تھاپ تھپَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: puMn pRqwpn bwF jYq Dun pwpn ky bhu puMj KpYNgy ]

en.bdb: The praises of the glories of virtues would increase and the heaps of sins would be destroyed

pu.ss: ijs dy ismrn nwl puMnw dI pRcMfqw vD jwdI hY Aqy ijs dy jYGoS nUM sux ky pwpw dy smUh nSt ho jwdy hn;
pu.bdb: ijs dy ismrn nwl puMnw dI pRcMfqw vD jwdI hY Aqy ijs dy jYGoS nUM sux ky pwpw dy smUh nSt ho jwdy hn;

transliteration.en: pu(n)n prataapan baadd jait dhun paapan ke bahu pu(n)j khapai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: पुँन प्रतापन बाढ जैत धुन पापन के बहु पुँज खपैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: پُنّ پرتاپن باڈھ جَےت دھُن پاپن کے بهُ پُںج کھپَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: swD smUh pRsMn iPrYN jg sqR sBY Aivlok cpYNgy ]7]27]

en.bdb: All the saints would wander in the world with bliss and the enemies would be annoyed on seeing them.7.27.

pu.ss: (aus dy pRqwp nUM) vyK ky swry sMq jgq ivc pRsMnqw-pUrvk iPrdy hn Aqy aunHw nUM vyK ky vYrI lok nSt ho jwdy hn ]7]27]
pu.bdb: (aus dy pRqwp nUM) vyK ky swry sMq jgq ivc pRsMnqw-pUrvk iPrdy hn Aqy aunHw nUM vyK ky vYrI lok nSt ho jwdy hn ]7]27]

transliteration.en: saadh samooh prasa(n)n firai(n) jag satr sabhai avilok chapai(n)ge ||7||27||
transliteration.hi: साध समूह प्रसंन फिरैं जग सत्र सभै अविलोक चपैंगे ॥७॥२७॥
transliteration.ur: سادھ سمُوه پرسنّ پھرَےں جگ ستر سبھَے اولوک چپَےںگے ۔۔۷۔۔۲۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mwnv ieMdR gijMdR nrwDp jOn iqRlok ko rwj krYNgy ]

en.bdb: King of men and elephants, emperors who would rule over the three worlds.

pu.ss: jo mnu`K, ieMdr, gijMdr, kubyr vwg iqMn lokw auqy rwj krdy hn;
pu.bdb: jo mnu`K, ieMdr, gijMdr, kubyr vwg iqMn lokw auqy rwj krdy hn;

transliteration.en: maanav i(n)dhr gaji(n)dhr naraadhap jauan tiralok ko raaj karai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: मानव इंद्र गजिंद्र नराधप जौन तृलोक को राज करैंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: مانو اںدر گجںدر نرادھپ جَون ترلوک کو راج کرَےںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: koit iesnwn gjwidk dwn Anyk suAMbr swj brYNgy ]

en.bdb: Who would perform millions of ablutions, give elephants and other animals in charity and arrange many svayyamuaras (self-marriage functions) for weddings.

pu.ss: jo kroVw qIrQw dw ieSnwn krky hwQI Awid dwn krdy hn Aqy Anyk suAMbrw dI ivvsQw kr ky (iesqrIAW nUM) vrdy hn;
pu.bdb: jo kroVw qIrQw dw ieSnwn krky hwQI Awid dwn krdy hn Aqy Anyk suAMbrw dI ivvsQw kr ky (iesqrIAW nUM) vrdy hn;

transliteration.en: koT isanaan gajaadhik dhaan anek sua(n)bar saaj barai(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: कोटि इसनान गजादिक दान अनेक सुअंबर साज बरैंगे ॥
