verses.gurmukhi: KUk mlhwrI gj gdwhw ibBUqDwrI igdUAw mswn bws kirE eI krq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by eating filth, by besmearing the body with ashes and by residing in he cremation-ground, then the hog eats filth, the elephant and ass get their bodies filled with ashes and the bager resides in the cremation-ground.

pu.ss: (jy AGorIAW vwg ml KwidAW mukqI imldI qw) sUr ml Kwdw hY; (jy ivBUqI mlx nwl mukqI imldI qw) hwQI Aqy Koqy Kyh ivc vilddy hn; (jy mswxw ivc irhw mukqI imldI qw) igdV mswxw ivc hI irhw krdy hn (aunHw nUM mukqI ikauW nhIN imldI);
pu.bdb: (jy AGorIAW vwg ml KwidAW mukqI imldI qw) sUr ml Kwdw hY; (jy ivBUqI mlx nwl mukqI imldI qw) hwQI Aqy Koqy Kyh ivc vilddy hn; (jy mswxw ivc irhw mukqI imldI qw) igdV mswxw ivc hI irhw krdy hn (aunHw nUM mukqI ikauW nhIN imldI);

transliteration.en: khook malahaaree gaj gadhaahaa bibhootadhaaree gidhooaa masaan baas kario iee karat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: खूक मलहारी गज गदाहा बिभूतधारी गिदूआ मसान बास करिओ ई करत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: کھُوک ملهاریِ گج گداها ببھُوتدھاریِ گدُوآ مسان باس کراو ای کرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: GuGU mtbwsI lgy folq audwsI imRg qrvr sdIv mon swDy eI mrq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord meets in the cloister of mendicants, by wandering like a stoic and abiding in silence, then the owl lives in the cloister of mendicants, the deer wanders like a stoic and the tree abides in silence till death.

pu.ss: (jy mTw ivc vs ky mukqI imldI qw) au`lU mTw ivc hI vsdy hn; (jy Brmx kridAW mukqI imldI qw) pSU ('imRg') sdw audwsIAW vwg iPrdy rihMdy hn; (jy mOn Dwrn krn nwl mukqI imldI qw) ibRC sdw mOn DwirAW hI mr jwdy hn;
pu.bdb: (jy mTw ivc vs ky mukqI imldI qw) au`lU mTw ivc hI vsdy hn; (jy Brmx kridAW mukqI imldI qw) pSU ('imRg') sdw audwsIAW vwg iPrdy rihMdy hn; (jy mOn Dwrn krn nwl mukqI imldI qw) ibRC sdw mOn DwirAW hI mr jwdy hn;

transliteration.en: ghughoo maTabaasee lage ddolat udhaasee mirag taravar sadheev mon saadhe iee marat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: घुघू मटबासी लगे डोलत उदासी मृग तरवर सदीव मोन साधे ई मरत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: گھُگھُو مٹباسیِ لگے ڈولت اُداسیِ مرگ ترور سدیِو مون سادھے ای مرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ibMd ky sD`Xw qwih hIj kI bf`Xw dyq bMdrw sdIv pwie nwgy eI iPrq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by restraining the emission of semen and by wandering with bare feet, then a eunuch may be eulogized for restraining the emission of semen and the monkey always wanders with bare feet.

pu.ss: (jy) vIrj dy swiDAW (bRhmcrX nUM pwilAW) (mukqI imldI) qw aunRhw nUM hIjVy dI qulnw dyxI cwhIdI hY; (jy nMgy pYrI iPrn nwl mukqI imldI, qw) bMdr sdw nMgy pYrIN iPrdy hn (aunRhw nUM mukqI ikauW nhIN imldI);
pu.bdb: (jy) vIrj dy swiDAW (bRhmcrX nUM pwilAW) (mukqI imldI) qw aunRhw nUM hIjVy dI qulnw dyxI cwhIdI hY; (jy nMgy pYrI iPrn nwl mukqI imldI, qw) bMdr sdw nMgy pYrIN iPrdy hn (aunRhw nUM mukqI ikauW nhIN imldI);

transliteration.en: bi(n)dh ke sadha'yaa taeh heej kee badda'yaa dhet ba(n)dharaa sadheev pai naage iee firat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: बिंद के सधय्या ताहि हीज की बडय्या देत बंदरा सदीव पाइ नागे ई फिरत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: بِںد کے سدھّےا تاه هیِج کیِ بڈّےا دےت بںدرا سدیِو پاا ناگے ای پھرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AMgnw ADIn kwm kRoD mY pRbIn eyk igAwn ky ibhIn CIn kYsy kY qrq hYN ]1]71]

en.bdb: One who is under the control of a woman and whou is active in lust and anger and also who is ignorant of the Knowledge of the ONE LORD, how can such person ferry across the world-ocean? 1.71.

pu.ss: iesqrI dy ADIn Aqy kwm kRoD Awid iviSAW ivc pUrI qrRhw ilpq qu`C (ivAkqI) iek bRhm igAwn qoN ibnw ikvyW Bv-swgr qoN qr skdy hn ]1]71]
pu.bdb: iesqrI dy ADIn Aqy kwm kRoD Awid iviSAW ivc pUrI qrRhw ilpq qu`C (ivAkqI) iek bRhm igAwn qoN ibnw ikvyW Bv-swgr qoN qr skdy hn ]1]71]

transliteration.en: a(n)ganaa adheen kaam krodh mai prabeen ek giaan ke biheen chheen kaise kai tarat hai(n) ||1||71||
transliteration.hi: अंगना अधीन काम क्रोध मै प्रबीन एक गिआन के बिहीन छीन कैसे कै तरत हैं ॥१॥७१॥
transliteration.ur: اںگنا ادھیٍن کام کرودھ مَے پربیٍن اےک گآن کے بهیٍن چھیٍن کَےسے کَے ترت هَےں ۔۔۱۔۔۷۱۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: BUq bncwrI iCq Caunw sBY dUDwDwrI paun ky AhwrI su BujMg jwnIAqu hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by wandering in the forest, by drinking only the milk and by subsisting on air, then the ghost wanders in the forest, all the infants live on milk and the serpents subsist on air.

pu.ss: BUq bn ivc iPrn vwly hn, DrqI ('iCq') auqy swry Coty b`cy (mw dy) du`D auqy pldy hn, pOx nUM Awhwr bxwaux vwly s`p AKvwauWdy hn;
pu.bdb: BUq bn ivc iPrn vwly hn, DrqI ('iCq') auqy swry Coty b`cy (mw dy) du`D auqy pldy hn, pOx nUM Awhwr bxwaux vwly s`p AKvwauWdy hn;

transliteration.en: bhoot banachaaree chhit chhaunaa sabhai dhoodhaadhaaree paun ke ahaaree su bhuja(n)g jaaneeat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: भूत बनचारी छित छउना सभै दूधाधारी पउन के अहारी सु भुजंग जानीअतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: بھُوت بنچاریِ چھت چھانا سبھَے دُودھادھاریِ پان کے اهاریِ سُ بھُجںگ جانیِات هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: iqRx ky BC`Xw Dn loB ky qj`Xw qy qo gaUAn ky j`Xw ibRKB`Xw mwnIAqu hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord meets by eating grass and forsaking the gred of wealth, then the Bulls, the young ones of cows do that.

pu.ss: Gwh Kwx vwilAW Aqy Dn dy loB nUM iqAwgx vwilAW nUM gaUAW dy jwey bld hI mMnxw cwhIdw hY (ikauWik auh isr sut ky ibnw iksy lwlsw dy kMm krI jwdy hn);
pu.bdb: Gwh Kwx vwilAW Aqy Dn dy loB nUM iqAwgx vwilAW nUM gaUAW dy jwey bld hI mMnxw cwhIdw hY (ikauWik auh isr sut ky ibnw iksy lwlsw dy kMm krI jwdy hn);

transliteration.en: tiran ke bhachha'yaa dhan lobh ke taja'yaa te to guooan ke ja'yaa birakhabha'yaa maaneeat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: तृण के भछय्या धन लोभ के तजय्या ते तो गऊअन के जय्या बृखभय्या मानीअतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: تِرݨ کے بھچھّےا دھن لوبھ کے تجّےا تے تو گاُوان کے جّےا برکھبھّےا مانیِات هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nB ky auf`Xw qwih pMCI kI bf`Xw dyq bgulw ibVwl ibRk iDAwnI TwnIAqu hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by flying in the sky and by closing the eyes in meditation, then the birds fly in the sky and those who close their eyes in meditation are considered like crane, cat and wolf.

pu.ss: (jo is`DIAW dy bl qy) AwkwS ivc aufdy hn, aunHw nUM pMCI dI aupmw dyxI cwhIdI hY Aqy bgly, ib`ly qy biGAwV nUM iDAwnI kihxw cwhIdw hY (ikauWik auh iSkwr dI qwk ivc A`Kw bMd kr ky bYTy rihMdy hn);
pu.bdb: (jo is`DIAW dy bl qy) AwkwS ivc aufdy hn, aunHw nUM pMCI dI aupmw dyxI cwhIdI hY Aqy bgly, ib`ly qy biGAwV nUM iDAwnI kihxw cwhIdw hY (ikauWik auh iSkwr dI qwk ivc A`Kw bMd kr ky bYTy rihMdy hn);

transliteration.en: nabh ke udda'yaa taeh pa(n)chhee kee badda'yaa dhet bagulaa biRaal birak dhiaanee Thaaneeat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: नभ के उडय्या ताहि पंछी की बडय्या देत बगुला बिड़ाल बृक धिआनी ठानीअतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: نبھ کے اُڈّےا تاه پںچھیِ کیِ بڈّےا دےت بگلا بڑال برک دھآنیِ ٹھانیِات هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jyqo bfy igAwnI iqno jwnI pY bKwnI nwih AYsy n pRpMc min BUil AwnIAqu hYN ]2]72]

en.bdb: All the Knowers of Brahman know the reality of these imposters, but I have not related it never bring in your mind such deceitful thoughts even by mistake. 2.72.

pu.ss: ijqny vI v`fy v`fy igAwnI hoey hn, aunHw ny (ienHw idKwivAW dI AslIAq nUM) smJ ilAw, pr disAw kuJ nhIN, (ies leI AsIN gj vj ky kihMdy hw ik) Aijhy pRpMcw AQvw pwKMfw nUM Bul ky vI mn ivc nhIN ilAwauxw cwhIdw ]2]72]
pu.bdb: ijqny vI v`fy v`fy igAwnI hoey hn, aunHw ny (ienHw idKwivAW dI AslIAq nUM) smJ ilAw, pr disAw kuJ nhIN, (ies leI AsIN gj vj ky kihMdy hw ik) Aijhy pRpMcw AQvw pwKMfw nUM Bul ky vI mn ivc nhIN ilAwauxw cwhIdw ]2]72]

transliteration.en: jeto badde giaanee tino jaanee pai bakhaanee naeh aaise na prapa(n)ch man bhool aaneeat hai(n) ||2||72||
transliteration.hi: जेतो बडे गिआनी तिनो जानी पै बखानी नाहि ऐसे न प्रपंच मनि भूलि आनीअतु हैं ॥२॥७२॥
transliteration.ur: جےتو بڈے گآنیِ تنو جانیِ پَے بکھانیِ ناه اَےسے ن پرپںچ من بھُول آنیِات هَےں ۔۔۲۔۔۷۲۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: BUm ky bs`Xw qwih BUcrI kY j`Xw khY nB ky auf`Xw so icr`Xw kY bKwnIAY ]

en.bdb: He who lives on the earth should be called the young one of white ant and those who fly in the sky may be called sparrows.

pu.ss: BUmI auqy vsx vwilAW nUM BUcrI ('GIs') dy jwey kihxw cwhIdw hY Aqy AwkwS ivc aufx vwilAW nUM icVIAW kihxw cwhIdw hY;
pu.bdb: BUmI auqy vsx vwilAW nUM BUcrI ('GIs') dy jwey kihxw cwhIdw hY Aqy AwkwS ivc aufx vwilAW nUM icVIAW kihxw cwhIdw hY;

transliteration.en: bhoom ke basa'yaa taeh bhoocharee kai ja'yaa kahai nabh ke udda'yaa so chira'yaa kai bakhaaneeaai ||
transliteration.hi: भूम के बसय्या ताहि भूचरी कै जय्या कहै नभ के उडय्या सो चिरय्या कै बखानीऐ ॥
transliteration.ur: بھُوم کے بسّےا تاه بھُوچریِ کَے جّےا کهَے نبھ کے اُڈّےا سو چرّےا کَے بکھانیِاَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Pl ky BC`Xw qwih bWdrI ky j`Xw khY Awids iPr`Xw qy qo BUq kY pCwnIAY ]

en.bdb: They, who eat fruit may be called the young ones of monkeys, those who wander invisibly, may be considered as ghosts.

pu.ss: Plw dy Kwx vwilAW nUM bwdrI dy pYdw kIqy kihxw cwhIdw hY Aqy AidRSt rUp ivc iPrn vwilAW nUM BUq smJxw cwhIdw hY;
pu.bdb: Plw dy Kwx vwilAW nUM bwdrI dy pYdw kIqy kihxw cwhIdw hY Aqy AidRSt rUp ivc iPrn vwilAW nUM BUq smJxw cwhIdw hY;

transliteration.en: fal ke bhachha'yaa taeh baa(n)dharee ke ja'yaa kahai aadhis fira'yaa te to bhoot kai pachhaaneeaai ||
transliteration.hi: फल के भछय्या ताहि बाँदरी के जय्या कहै आदिस फिरय्या ते तो भूत कै पछानीऐ ॥
transliteration.ur: پھل کے بھچھّےا تاه باںدریِ کے جّےا کهَے آدس پھرّےا تے تو بھُوت کَے پچھانیِاَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jl ky qr`Xw ko gMgyrI sI khq jg Awg ky BC`Xw so ckor sm mwnIAY ]

en.bdb: One, who swims on water is called water-fly by the world one, who eats fire, may be considered like Chakor (redlegged partridge).

pu.ss: pwxI ivc qrn vwilAW nUM jgq 'jl-julwhw' hI kihMdw hY (ikauWik aufx vwlw auh kIVw jl auqy hI qwxw qxdw rihMdw hY) Aqy A`g Kwx vwly nUM ckor vrgw smJxw cwhIdw hY;
pu.bdb: pwxI ivc qrn vwilAW nUM jgq 'jl-julwhw' hI kihMdw hY (ikauWik aufx vwlw auh kIVw jl auqy hI qwxw qxdw rihMdw hY) Aqy A`g Kwx vwly nUM ckor vrgw smJxw cwhIdw hY;

transliteration.en: jal ke tara'yaa ko ga(n)geree see kahat jag aag ke bhachha'yaa so chakor sam maaneeaai ||
transliteration.hi: जल के तरय्या को गंगेरी सी कहत जग आग के भछय्या सो चकोर सम मानीऐ ॥
transliteration.ur: جل کے ترّےا کو گںگےریِ سیِ کهت جگ آگ کے بھچھّےا سو چکور سم مانیِاَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sUrj isv`Xw qwih kOl kI bfweI dyq cMdRmw isv`Xw kO kvI kY pihcwnIAY ]3]73]

en.bdb: One who worships the sun, may be symbolized as lotus and one, who worships the moon may be recognized as water-lily (The lotus blooms on seeing the sun and the water-lily blossoms on seeing the moon). 3.73.

pu.ss: sUrj dy aupwsk nUM kml Pul dI aupmw dyxI cwhIdI hY Aqy cMdRmw dy aupwsk nUM kmlnI smJxw cwhIdw hY (ikauWik ieh kRmvwr sUrj Aqy cMdRmw nUM vyK ky iKVdy jw ivgsdy hn) ]3]73]
pu.bdb: sUrj dy aupwsk nUM kml Pul dI aupmw dyxI cwhIdI hY Aqy cMdRmw dy aupwsk nUM kmlnI smJxw cwhIdw hY (ikauWik ieh kRmvwr sUrj Aqy cMdRmw nUM vyK ky iKVdy jw ivgsdy hn) ]3]73]

transliteration.en: sooraj siva'yaa taeh kaual kee baddaiee dhet cha(n)dhramaa siva'yaa kau kavee kai pahichaaneeaai ||3||73||
transliteration.hi: सूरज सिवय्या ताहि कौल की बडाई देत चंद्रमा सिवय्या कौ कवी कै पहिचानीऐ ॥३॥७३॥
transliteration.ur: سُورج سوّےا تاه کَول کیِ بڈاای دےت چںدرما سوّےا کَو کویِ کَے پهِچانیِاَے ۔۔۳۔۔۷۳۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nwrwiex k`C m`C iqMdUAw khq sB kaul nwB kaul ijh qwl mYN rhqu hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Name of the Lord is Narayana (One whose house is in water), then Kachh (tortoise incarnation), Machh (fish incarnation) and Tandooaa (octopus) will be called Naryana and if the Name of the Lord is Kaul-Naabh (Navel-lotus), then the tank in which th

pu.ss: (jy jl ivc invws krn vwly nUM nwrwiex ikhw jwxw hY qw) swirAW kCUAW, m`Cw Aqy qyWdUAW nUM nwrwiex ikhw jwvygw, (jy ivSxU nUM 'kOl-nwBI' AwKdy hn qw) ijs qwlwb ivc kml pYdw huMdy hn, kI auh kOl-nwBI nhIN hY;
pu.bdb: (jy jl ivc invws krn vwly nUM nwrwiex ikhw jwxw hY qw) swirAW kCUAW, m`Cw Aqy qyWdUAW nUM nwrwiex ikhw jwvygw, (jy ivSxU nUM 'kOl-nwBI' AwKdy hn qw) ijs qwlwb ivc kml pYdw huMdy hn, kI auh kOl-nwBI nhIN hY;

transliteration.en: naarain ka'chh ma'chh ti(n)dhooaa kahat sabh kaul naabh kaul jeh taal mai(n) rahat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: नाराइण कच्छ मच्छ तिंदूआ कहत सभ कउल नाभ कउल जिह ताल मैं रहतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: نارااݨ کّچھ مّچھ تںدُوآ کهت سبھ کال نابھ کال جه تال مَےں رهت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: gopI nwQ gUjr gupwl sBY DyncwrI irKIkys nwm kY mhMq lhIAqu hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Name of the Lord is Gopi Nath, then the Lord of Gopi is a cowherd if the Name of the Lord is GOPAL, the Sustainer of cows, then all the cowherds are Dhencharis (the Graziers of cows) if the Name of the Lord is Rikhikes, then there are several chief

pu.ss: (jy aus prm-s`qw dw nw) gopInwQ hY qw swry gujr Aqy gaUAW dy pwlk gvwly gopIAW dy pqI (nhIN hn) jy (aus dw nwm irKIkyS hY qw) irKIkyS nw dy keI mhMq vyKy jwdy hn;
pu.bdb: (jy aus prm-s`qw dw nw) gopInwQ hY qw swry gujr Aqy gaUAW dy pwlk gvwly gopIAW dy pqI (nhIN hn) jy (aus dw nwm irKIkyS hY qw) irKIkyS nw dy keI mhMq vyKy jwdy hn;

transliteration.en: gopee naath goojar gupaal sabhai dhenachaaree rikheekes naam kai maha(n)t laheeat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: गोपी नाथ गूजर गुपाल सभै धेनचारी रिखीकेस नाम कै महंत लहीअतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: گوپیِ ناتھ گُوجر گُپال سبھَے دھےنچاریِ رکھیِکےس نام کَے مهںت لهیِات هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mwDv Bvr AO AtyrU ko knHXw nwm kMs ky bD`Xw jmdUq khIAqu hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Name of Lord is Madhva, then the black bee is also called Madhva if the Name of the Lord is Kanhaya, then the spider is also called Kanhaya if the Name of he Lord is the "Slayer of Kansa," then the messenger of Yama, who slayed Kansa, may be called

pu.ss: (jy aus dw nw mwDv XdUvMSI ikRSx hY qw BOry dw nw vI) mwDv hY, (jy aus dw nw knH`Xw hY qw lMmIAW tMgw vwlI) mkVI dw nw vI knH`Xw hY Aqy (jy aus dw nw kMs-bDk hY qw) kMs nUM mwrn vwlw jmdUq vI kMs-bDk hY;
pu.bdb: (jy aus dw nw mwDv XdUvMSI ikRSx hY qw BOry dw nw vI) mwDv hY, (jy aus dw nw knH`Xw hY qw lMmIAW tMgw vwlI) mkVI dw nw vI knH`Xw hY Aqy (jy aus dw nw kMs-bDk hY qw) kMs nUM mwrn vwlw jmdUq vI kMs-bDk hY;

transliteration.en: maadhav bhavar aau aTeroo ko kanhayaa naam ka(n)s ke badha'yaa jamadhoot kaheeat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: माधव भवर औ अटेरू को कन्हया नाम कंस के बधय्या जमदूत कहीअतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: مادھو بھور اَو اٹےرُو کو کنھےا نام کںس کے بدھّےا جمدُوت کهیِات هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mUVH rUVH pItq n gUVHqw ko Byd pwvY pUjq n qwih jw ky rwKy rhIAqu hYN ]4]74]

en.bdb: The foolish people wail and weep. But do not know the profound secret, therefore they do not worship Him, who protects our life. 4.74.

pu.ss: AigAwnI lok kyvl prMprw (lkIr dI PkIrI) nUM pwldy hn, (pr) bRhmigAwn dy rh`s nUM smJdy nhIN Aqy aus nUM pUjdy nhIN ijs dy riKAW (sMswr ivc) rhIdw hY ]4]74]
pu.bdb: AigAwnI lok kyvl prMprw (lkIr dI PkIrI) nUM pwldy hn, (pr) bRhmigAwn dy rh`s nUM smJdy nhIN Aqy aus nUM pUjdy nhIN ijs dy riKAW (sMswr ivc) rhIdw hY ]4]74]

transliteration.en: mooRh rooRh peeTat na gooRhataa ko bhedh paavai poojat na taeh jaa ke raakhe raheeat hai(n) ||4||74||
transliteration.hi: मूड़्ह रूड़्ह पीटत न गूड़्हता को भेद पावै पूजत न ताहि जा के राखे रहीअतु हैं ॥४॥७४॥
transliteration.ur: مُوڑھ رُوڑھ پیِٹت ن گُوڑھتا کو بھےد پاوَے پُوجت ن تاه جا کے راکھے رهیِات هَےں ۔۔۴۔۔۷۴۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ibsÍpwl jgq kwl dIn idAwl bYrI swl sdw pRqpwl jm jwl qy rhq hYN ]

en.bdb: The Sustainer and Destroyer of the Universe is Benevolent towards the poor, tortures the enemies, preserves ever and is without the snare of death.

pu.ss: (jo prmwqmw) ivSv dw pwlk Aqy jgq dw kwl-srUp hY, dInw auqy idAwlU Aqy vYrIAW leI duKdwiek hY, (hr iek dI) sdw pwlnw krdw hY Aqy jm dy jwl dy pRBwv qoN mukq hY।
pu.bdb: (jo prmwqmw) ivSv dw pwlk Aqy jgq dw kwl-srUp hY, dInw auqy idAwlU Aqy vYrIAW leI duKdwiek hY, (hr iek dI) sdw pwlnw krdw hY Aqy jm dy jwl dy pRBwv qoN mukq hY।

transliteration.en: bisavaipaal jagat kaal dheen dhiaal bairee saal sadhaa pratapaal jam jaal te rahat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: बिस्वपाल जगत काल दीन दिआल बैरी साल सदा प्रतपाल जम जाल ते रहत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: بِسوپال جگت کال دیٍن دآل بَےریِ سال سدا پرتپال جم جال تے رهت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jogI jtwDwrI sqI swcy bfy bRhmcwrI iDAwn kwj BUK ipAws dyh pY shq hYN ]

en.bdb: The Yogis, hermits with matted locks, true donors and great celibates, for a Sight of Him, endure hunger and thirst on their bodies.

pu.ss: (keI) jtwDwrI jogI, s`cy sqI Aqy v`fy bRhmcwrI (aus pRBU dy) iDAwn leI BuK Aqy ipAws nUM Awpxy SrIr auqy sihn krdy hn।
pu.bdb: (keI) jtwDwrI jogI, s`cy sqI Aqy v`fy bRhmcwrI (aus pRBU dy) iDAwn leI BuK Aqy ipAws nUM Awpxy SrIr auqy sihn krdy hn।

transliteration.en: jogee jaTaadhaaree satee saache badde brahamachaaree dhiaan kaaj bhookh piaas dheh pai sahat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जोगी जटाधारी सती साचे बडे ब्रहमचारी धिआन काज भूख पिआस देह पै सहत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: جوگیِ جٹادھاریِ ستیِ ساچے بڈے برهمچاریِ دھآن کاج بھُوکھ پآس دےه پَے سهت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: inaulI krm jl hom pwvk pvn hom ADo muK eyk pwie TwFy n bhq hYN ]

en.bdb: For a Sight of Him, the intestines are purged, offerings are made to water, fire and air, austerities are performed with face upside down and standing on a single foot.

pu.ss: (aus dy igAwn dI pRwpqI leI keI) nOil krm, (krdy hn Aqy keI) jl, AgnI Aqy pOx nwl sMbMiDq hom (krdy hn Aqy keI) mUDy mUMh ltk ky (Aqy keI) iek pYr qy KVy ho ky (smyW nUM) guzwrdy hn।
pu.bdb: (aus dy igAwn dI pRwpqI leI keI) nOil krm, (krdy hn Aqy keI) jl, AgnI Aqy pOx nwl sMbMiDq hom (krdy hn Aqy keI) mUDy mUMh ltk ky (Aqy keI) iek pYr qy KVy ho ky (smyW nUM) guzwrdy hn।

transliteration.en: niaulee karam jal hom paavak pavan hom adho mukh ek pai Thaadde na bahat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: निउली करम जल होम पावक पवन होम अधो मुख एक पाइ ठाढे न बहत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: نِالیِ کرم جل هوم پاوک پون هوم ادھو مُکھ اےک پاا ٹھاڈھے ن بهت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mwnv PinMd dyv dwnv n pwvY Byd byd AO kqyb nyq nyq kY khq hYN ]5]75]

en.bdb: The men, Sheshanaga, gods and demons have not been able to know His Secret and the Vedas and Katebs (Semitic Scriptures) speak of Him as “Neti, Neti” (Not this, Not this) and Infinite. 5.75.

pu.ss: (aus dw) Byd mnu`K, SySnwg, dyvqy Aqy dYNq nhIN pw skdy Aqy vyd qy kqyb vI byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn ]5]75]
pu.bdb: (aus dw) Byd mnu`K, SySnwg, dyvqy Aqy dYNq nhIN pw skdy Aqy vyd qy kqyb vI byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn ]5]75]

transliteration.en: maanav fani(n)dh dhev dhaanav na paavai bhedh bedh aau kateb net net kai kahat hai(n) ||5||75||
transliteration.hi: मानव फनिंद देव दानव न पावै भेद बेद औ कतेब नेत नेत कै कहत हैं ॥५॥७५॥
transliteration.ur: مانو پھنںد دےو دانو ن پاوَے بھےد بےد اَو کتےب نےت نےت کَے کهت هَےں ۔۔۵۔۔۷۵۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nwcq iPrq mor bwdr krq Gor dwmnI Anyk Bwau kirE eI krq hY ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by devotional dancing, then the peacocks dance with the thundering of the clouds and if the Lord gets pleased on seeing the devotion through friendliness, then the lightning performs it by various flashes.

pu.ss: (jy prmwqmw inRq-BgqI krn nwl imldw hovy qw) mor ncdw rihMdw hY; (jy prmwqmw nrisMGy vjwaux nwl imldw hovy qw) bdl gjdy rihMdy hn; (Aqy jy prmwqmw rws-lIlw nwl imldw hovy qw) ibjlI Anyk hwv-Bwv krdI hI rihMdI hY।
pu.bdb: (jy prmwqmw inRq-BgqI krn nwl imldw hovy qw) mor ncdw rihMdw hY; (jy prmwqmw nrisMGy vjwaux nwl imldw hovy qw) bdl gjdy rihMdy hn; (Aqy jy prmwqmw rws-lIlw nwl imldw hovy qw) ibjlI Anyk hwv-Bwv krdI hI rihMdI hY।

transliteration.en: naachat firat mor baadhar karat ghor dhaamanee anek bhaau kario iee karat hai ||
transliteration.hi: नाचत फिरत मोर बादर करत घोर दामनी अनेक भाउ करिओ ई करत है ॥
transliteration.ur: ناچت پھرت مور بادر کرت گھور دامنیِ انےک بھاا کراو ای کرت هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: cMdRmw qy sIql n sUrj ky qpq qyj ieMdR so n rwjw Bv BUm ko Brq hY ]

en.bdb: If the Lord meets by adopting coolness and serenity, then there is none cooler than the moon if the Lord meets by the endurance of heat, then none is hotter than the sun, and if the Lord is realized by the munificence, then none is more munificent than In

pu.ss: (jy prmwqmw SwqI DwirAW imldw hovy qw) cMdRmw qoN koeI TMfw nhIN hY, (jy auh grmI shwirAw imldw hovy qw) sUrj vrgy qpdy qyj vwlw koeI nhIN hY (Aqy jy lokw nUM mwl-Dn nwl Brn nwl iksy rwjy nUM prmwqmw imldw hovy qw) ieMdr vrgw jgq Aqy DrqI nUM Brn vwlw koeI rwjw nhIN hY।
pu.bdb: (jy prmwqmw SwqI DwirAW imldw hovy qw) cMdRmw qoN koeI TMfw nhIN hY, (jy auh grmI shwirAw imldw hovy qw) sUrj vrgy qpdy qyj vwlw koeI nhIN hY (Aqy jy lokw nUM mwl-Dn nwl Brn nwl iksy rwjy nUM prmwqmw imldw hovy qw) ieMdr vrgw jgq Aqy DrqI nUM Brn vwlw koeI rwjw nhIN hY।

transliteration.en: cha(n)dhramaa te seetal na sooraj ke tapat tej i(n)dhr so na raajaa bhav bhoom ko bharat hai ||
transliteration.hi: चंद्रमा ते सीतल न सूरज के तपत तेज इंद्र सो न राजा भव भूम को भरत है ॥
transliteration.ur: چںدرما تے سیِتل ن سُورج کے تپت تےج اںدر سو ن راجا بھو بھُوم کو بھرت هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: isv sy qpsI Awid bRhmw sy n bydcwrI snq kumwr sI qp`isAw n Anq hY ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realised by the practice of austerities, then none is more austere than god Shiva if the Lord meets by the recitation of Vedas, then none is more conversant with the Vedas than the god Brahma: there is also no great performer of asceticism

pu.ss: (jy qp kIiqAW imldw hovy qw) iSv vrgw (koeI) qpsI nhIN (qy jy vyd pVRihAW imldw hovy qw) bRhmw vrgw vydivcwrI koeI nhIN hY Aqy (jy qpisAw kIiqAW imldw hovy qw) snq kumwr vrgI qpisAw iksy hor ny nhIN krnI।
pu.bdb: (jy qp kIiqAW imldw hovy qw) iSv vrgw (koeI) qpsI nhIN (qy jy vyd pVRihAW imldw hovy qw) bRhmw vrgw vydivcwrI koeI nhIN hY Aqy (jy qpisAw kIiqAW imldw hovy qw) snq kumwr vrgI qpisAw iksy hor ny nhIN krnI।

transliteration.en: siv se tapasee aadh brahamaa se na bedhachaaree sanat kumaar see tapa'siaa na anat hai ||
transliteration.hi: सिव से तपसी आदि ब्रहमा से न बेदचारी सनत कुमार सी तपस्सिआ न अनत है ॥
transliteration.ur: سِو سے تپسیِ آد برهما سے ن بےدچاریِ سنت کُمار سیِ تپّسآ ن انت هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: igAwn ky ibhIn kwl Pws ky ADIn sdw ju`gn kI caukrI iPrwey eI iPrq hY ]6]76]

en.bdb: The persons without the Knowledge of the Lord, entrapped in the snare of death always transmigrate in all the four ages. 6.76.

pu.ss: igAwn qoN vwJy lok, kwl dy PMDy ivc Psy lok sdw Xugw dI cOkVI dy iPrwey iPrdy rihMdy hn (ArQwq Awvwgvx ivc aulJy rihMdy hn) ]6]76]
pu.bdb: igAwn qoN vwJy lok, kwl dy PMDy ivc Psy lok sdw Xugw dI cOkVI dy iPrwey iPrdy rihMdy hn (ArQwq Awvwgvx ivc aulJy rihMdy hn) ]6]76]

transliteration.en: giaan ke biheen kaal faas ke adheen sadhaa ju'gan kee chaukaree firaae iee firat hai ||6||76||
transliteration.hi: गिआन के बिहीन काल फास के अधीन सदा जुग्गन की चउकरी फिराए ई फिरत है ॥६॥७६॥
transliteration.ur: گِآن کے بهیٍن کال پھاس کے ادھیٍن سدا جُّگن کیِ چاکریِ پھرااے ای پھرت هَے ۔۔۶۔۔۷۶۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: eyk isv Bey eyk gey eyk Pyr Bey rwmcMdR ikRsn ky Avqwr BI Anyk hYN ]

en.bdb: There was one Shiva, who passed away and another one came into being there are many incarnations of Ramchandra and Krishna.

pu.ss: iek iSv hoey auh vI gey, iek iPr hoey (auh vI cly gey) rwm cMdr, ikRSx vrgy Avqwr vI Anykw hoey।
pu.bdb: iek iSv hoey auh vI gey, iek iPr hoey (auh vI cly gey) rwm cMdr, ikRSx vrgy Avqwr vI Anykw hoey।

transliteration.en: ek siv bhe ek ge ek fer bhe raamacha(n)dhr kirasan ke avataar bhee anek hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: एक सिव भए एक गए एक फेर भए रामचंद्र कृसन के अवतार भी अनेक हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: اےک سو بھاے اےک گاے اےک پھےر بھاے رامچںدر کرسن کے اوتار بھیِ انےک هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: bRhmw Aru ibsn kyqy byd AO purwn kyqy isMimRiq smUhn kY huie huie ibqey hYN ]

en.bdb: There are many Brahmas and Vishnus, there are many Vedas and Puranas, there have been the authors of all the Smritis, who created their works and passed away.

pu.ss: ikqny hI bRhmw Aqy ivSxU (hoey) ikqny hI vyd Aqy purwn (hoey) Aqy simRqIAW dy smUh ho ho ky bIq gey hn।
pu.bdb: ikqny hI bRhmw Aqy ivSxU (hoey) ikqny hI vyd Aqy purwn (hoey) Aqy simRqIAW dy smUh ho ho ky bIq gey hn।

transliteration.en: brahamaa ar bisan kete bedh aau puraan kete si(n)mirat samoohan kai hui hui bite hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: ब्रहमा अरु बिसन केते बेद औ पुरान केते सिंमृति समूहन कै हुइ हुइ बितए हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: برهما ار بسن کےتے بےد اَو پُران کےتے سںمرت سمُوهن کَے هُا هُِا بتاے هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mondI mdwr kyqy AsunI kumwr kyqy AMsw Avqwr kyqy kwl bs Bey hYN ]

en.bdb: Many religious leaders, many chieftains of clans, many Ashwani Kumars and many degrees of incarnations, they had all been subject to death.

pu.ss: ikqny hI (Drm dI riKAw krn vwly) muAwvnu`dIn Aqy mdwr (SyK bdIhu`dIn knOjI vrgy drvyS) ikqny hI ASÍvnI kmwr, ikqny hI AMSAvqwr (ies sMswr ivc Aw ky) kwl vs ho gey hn।
pu.bdb: ikqny hI (Drm dI riKAw krn vwly) muAwvnu`dIn Aqy mdwr (SyK bdIhu`dIn knOjI vrgy drvyS) ikqny hI ASÍvnI kmwr, ikqny hI AMSAvqwr (ies sMswr ivc Aw ky) kwl vs ho gey hn।

transliteration.en: monadhee madhaar kete asunee kumaar kete a(n)saa avataar kete kaal bas bhe hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: मोनदी मदार केते असुनी कुमार केते अंसा अवतार केते काल बस भए हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: موندیِ مدار کےتے اسنیِ کُمار کےتے اںسا اوتار کےتے کال بس بھاے هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pIr AO ipkWbr kyqy gny n prq eyqy BUm hI qy huie kY Pyir BUim hI imley hYN ]7]77]

en.bdb: Many Muslim preceptors (Pirs) and Prophets, who cannot be count ed, they were born out of the earth, ultimately merged in the earth. 7.77.

pu.ss: ikqny hI pIr Aqy pYZMbr (hoey hn, jo) ieqny hn ik igxy nhIN jw skdy, auh (swry) BUmI auqy pYdw ho ky iPr BUmI ivc hI smw gey hn ]7]77]
pu.bdb: ikqny hI pIr Aqy pYZMbr (hoey hn, jo) ieqny hn ik igxy nhIN jw skdy, auh (swry) BUmI auqy pYdw ho ky iPr BUmI ivc hI smw gey hn ]7]77]

transliteration.en: peer aau pikaa(n)bar kete gane na parat ete bhoom hee te hui kai fer bhoom hee mile hai(n) ||7||77||
transliteration.hi: पीर औ पिकाँबर केते गने न परत एते भूम ही ते हुइ कै फेरि भूमि ही मिलए हैं ॥७॥७७॥
transliteration.ur: پیِر اَو پکاںبر کےتے گنے ن پرت اےتے بھُوم هیِ تے هُا کَے پھےر بھُوم هیِ ملاے هَےں ۔۔۷۔۔۷۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jogI jqI bRhmcwrI bfy bfy CqRDwrI CqR hI kI CwieAw keI kos lO clq hYN ]

en.bdb: The Yougis, celibates and students observing celibacy, many great sovereigns, who walk several miles under the shade of canopy.

pu.ss: jogI, jqI, bRhmcwrI Aqy v`fy v`fy CqRDwrI (rwjy) hoey hn, jo keI kohw qk CqRw dI Cw hyTw hI cldy hn (sMkyq durXoDn vl hY jo BISm ipqwmw nUM imlx leI 48 koh CqRw dI Cw hyT cl ky igAw sI);
pu.bdb: jogI, jqI, bRhmcwrI Aqy v`fy v`fy CqRDwrI (rwjy) hoey hn, jo keI kohw qk CqRw dI Cw hyTw hI cldy hn (sMkyq durXoDn vl hY jo BISm ipqwmw nUM imlx leI 48 koh CqRw dI Cw hyT cl ky igAw sI);

transliteration.en: jogee jatee brahamachaaree badde badde chhatradhaaree chhatr hee kee chhaiaa kiee kos lau chalat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जोगी जती ब्रहमचारी बडे बडे छत्रधारी छत्र ही की छाइआ कई कोस लौ चलत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: جوگیِ جتیِ برهمچاریِ بڈے بڈے چھتردھاریِ چھتر هیِ کیِ چھااآ کای کوس لَو چلت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: bfy bfy rwjn ky dwbiq iPriq dys bfy bfy rwjn ky dRp ko dlqu hYN ]

en.bdb: Who conquer the countries of many great kings and bruise their ego.

pu.ss: jo v`ifAW v`ifAW rwijAW dy dyS nUM dbwdy iPrdy sn Aqy v`ifAW v`ifAW rwijAW dy hMkwr nUM dldy iPrdy sn;
pu.bdb: jo v`ifAW v`ifAW rwijAW dy dyS nUM dbwdy iPrdy sn Aqy v`ifAW v`ifAW rwijAW dy hMkwr nUM dldy iPrdy sn;

transliteration.en: badde badde raajan ke dhaabat firat dhes badde badde raajan ke dhrap ko dhalat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: बडे बडे राजन के दाबति फिरति देस बडे बडे राजन के द्रप को दलतु हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: بڈے بڈے راجن کے دابت پھرت دےس بڈے بڈے راجن کے درپ کو دلت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: mwn sy mhIp AO idlIp kYsy CqRDwrI bfo AiBmwn Buj dMf ko krq hYN ]

en.bdb: The Sovereign like Mandhata and the Canopied Sovereign like Dalip, who were proud of their mightly forces.

pu.ss: mwnDwqw vrgy rwjy Aqy dlIp vrgy CqRDwrI jo AwpxIAW Bujwvw dw bhuq mwx krdy sn;
pu.bdb: mwnDwqw vrgy rwjy Aqy dlIp vrgy CqRDwrI jo AwpxIAW Bujwvw dw bhuq mwx krdy sn;

transliteration.en: maan se maheep aau dhileep kaise chhatradhaaree baddo abhimaan bhuj dha(n)dd ko karat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: मान से महीप औ दिलीप कैसे छत्रधारी बडो अभिमान भुज दंड को करत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: مان سے مهیِپ اَو دلیِپ کَےسے چھتردھاریِ بڈو ابھمان بھُج دںڈ کو کرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: dwrw sy idlIsr dRüjoDn sy mwnDwrI Bog Bog BUim AMq BUim mY imlq hYN ]8]78]

en.bdb: The emperor like Darius and the great egoist like Duryodhana, after enjoying the earthly pleasures, finally merged in the earth.8.78.

pu.ss: dwrw vrgy rwjy ('idlIsr') Aqy durXoDn vrgy hMkwrI (jo Bogw nUM) Bog Bog ky AMq ivc DrqI ivc hI iml gey hn ]8]78]
pu.bdb: dwrw vrgy rwjy ('idlIsr') Aqy durXoDn vrgy hMkwrI (jo Bogw nUM) Bog Bog ky AMq ivc DrqI ivc hI iml gey hn ]8]78]

transliteration.en: dhaaraa se dhileesar dhrujodhan se maanadhaaree bhog bhog bhoom a(n)t bhoom mai milat hai(n) ||8||78||
transliteration.hi: दारा से दिलीसर द्रुजोधन से मानधारी भोग भोग भूमि अंत भूमि मै मिलत हैं ॥८॥७८॥
transliteration.ur: دارا سے دلیِسر درüجودھن سے ماندھاریِ بھوگ بھوگ بھُوم اںت بھُوم مَے ملت هَےں ۔۔۸۔۔۷۸۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: isjdy kry Anyk qopcI kpt Bys posqI Anyk dw invwvq hY sIs kO ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is pleased by prostrating before Him, then the gunner full of deceit bows his head several times while igniting the gun and the addict acts in the same manner in intoxication.

pu.ss: (jy isjdw kIiqAW prmwqmw pRsMn huMdw hovy qw) qopcI kpt sihq Anyk vwr (golw dwgx leI) isjdw krdy hn Aqy posqI vI Anyk vwr isr invwauWdw hY।
pu.bdb: (jy isjdw kIiqAW prmwqmw pRsMn huMdw hovy qw) qopcI kpt sihq Anyk vwr (golw dwgx leI) isjdw krdy hn Aqy posqI vI Anyk vwr isr invwauWdw hY।

transliteration.en: sijadhe kare anek topachee kapaT bhes posatee anek dhaa nivaavat hai sees kau ||
transliteration.hi: सिजदे करे अनेक तोपची कपट भेस पोसती अनेक दा निवावत है सीस कौ ॥
transliteration.ur: سِجدے کرے انےک توپچیِ کپٹ بھےس پوستیِ انےک دا نواوت هَے سیِس کَو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khw BieE m`l jO pY kwFq Anyk fMf so qO n fMfOq AstWg AQqIs kO ]

en.bdb: What, then, if the wrestler bends his body several times during his rehearsal of exercises, but that is not the prostration of eight parts of the body.

pu.ss: kI hoieAw jy koeI pihlvwn Anyk fMf kFdw hY pr aus nUM eISvr ('AiQqIs') Agy kIqw AStwg fMfOq nhIN ikhw jw skdw।
pu.bdb: kI hoieAw jy koeI pihlvwn Anyk fMf kFdw hY pr aus nUM eISvr ('AiQqIs') Agy kIqw AStwg fMfOq nhIN ikhw jw skdw।

transliteration.en: kahaa bhio ma'l jau pai kaaddat anek dda(n)dd so tau na dda(n)ddauat asaTaa(n)g athatees kau ||
transliteration.hi: कहा भइओ मल्ल जौ पै काढत अनेक डंड सो तौ न डंडौत असटाँग अथतीस कौ ॥
transliteration.ur: کها بھِااو مّل جَو پَے کاڈھت انےک ڈںڈ سو تَو ن ڈںڈَوت اسٹاںگ اتھتیِس کَو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khw BieE rogI jO pY fwirE rihE aurD muK mn qy n mUMf inhrwieE Awid eIs kO ]

en.bdb: What, then, if the patient lies down with his face upwards, he has not bowed his head before the Primal Lord with single-mindedness.

pu.ss: kI hoieAw (jo koeI jogI) rogI vwg aupr vl mUMh kr ky ipAw rhy, (kI hoieAw jy koeI jogI isr munweI iPrdw rhy jdoN qk) mn nUM muMn ky (sv`C kr ky) prmwqmw dy drSn (iDAwn) nhIN krdw।
pu.bdb: kI hoieAw (jo koeI jogI) rogI vwg aupr vl mUMh kr ky ipAw rhy, (kI hoieAw jy koeI jogI isr munweI iPrdw rhy jdoN qk) mn nUM muMn ky (sv`C kr ky) prmwqmw dy drSn (iDAwn) nhIN krdw।

transliteration.en: kahaa bhio rogee jau pai ddaario rahio uradh mukh man te na moo(n)dd niharaio aadh iees kau ||
transliteration.hi: कहा भइओ रोगी जौ पै डारिओ रहिओ उरध मुख मन ते न मूँड निहराइओ आदि ईस कौ ॥
transliteration.ur: کها بھِااو روگیِ جَو پَے ڈاراو رهِاو اُردھ مُکھ من تے ن مُوںڈ نهراااو آد ایس کَو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kwmnw ADIn sdw dwmnw pRbIn eyk Bwvnw ibhIn kYsy pwvY jgdIs kO ]9]79]

en.bdb: But one always subservient to desire and active in telling the beads of the rosary, and also without faith, how can he realize the Lord of the world? 9.79.

pu.ss: (jo) kwmnwvw dy ADIn, Cl-kpt ivc pRbIn Aqy iek (prmwqmw) dI Bwvnw qoN sKxy hn, auh prmwqmw nUM ikvyW pRwpq kr skdy hn ]9]79]
pu.bdb: (jo) kwmnwvw dy ADIn, Cl-kpt ivc pRbIn Aqy iek (prmwqmw) dI Bwvnw qoN sKxy hn, auh prmwqmw nUM ikvyW pRwpq kr skdy hn ]9]79]

transliteration.en: kaamanaa adheen sadhaa dhaamanaa prabeen ek bhaavanaa biheen kaise paavai jagadhees kau ||9||79||
transliteration.hi: कामना अधीन सदा दामना प्रबीन एक भावना बिहीन कैसे पावै जगदीस कौ ॥९॥७९॥
transliteration.ur: کامنا ادھیٍن سدا دامنا پربیٍن اےک بھاونا بهیٍن کَےسے پاوَے جگدیِس کَو ۔۔۹۔۔۷۹۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sIs ptkq jw ky kwn mY KjUrw DsY mUMf Ctkq imqR puqR hUM ky sok sO ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by knocking the head, then that person repeatedly knocks his head, in whose ear the centipede enters and if the Lord meets by beating the head, then one beats his head in grief over the death of friends or sons.

pu.ss: (jy isr dy ptikAW prmwqmw imldw hovy, qw) ijs dy kMn ivc kMnKjU rw vV igAw hovy auh vI isr ptkdw hY (Aqy jy prmwqmw isr nUM iptx nwl imldw hovy qw) imqr Aqy pu`qr dy mrn dy sog ivc vI isr ipitAw jwdw hY।
pu.bdb: (jy isr dy ptikAW prmwqmw imldw hovy, qw) ijs dy kMn ivc kMnKjU rw vV igAw hovy auh vI isr ptkdw hY (Aqy jy prmwqmw isr nUM iptx nwl imldw hovy qw) imqr Aqy pu`qr dy mrn dy sog ivc vI isr ipitAw jwdw hY।

transliteration.en: sees paTakat jaa ke kaan mai khajooraa dhasai moo(n)dd chhaTakat mitr putr hoo(n) ke sok sau ||
transliteration.hi: सीस पटकत जा के कान मै खजूरा धसै मूँड छटकत मित्र पुत्र हूँ के सोक सौ ॥
transliteration.ur: سیِس پٹکت جا کے کان مَے کھجُورا دھسَے مُوںڈ چھٹکت متر پُتر هُوں کے سوک سَو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Awk ko cr`Xw Pl PUl ko BC`Xw sdw bn kO BRm`Xw AOr dUsro n bok sO ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realized by wandering in the forest, then there is none other like the he-goat, who grazes the akk (Calotropis Procera), eats the flowers and fruit and always wanders in the forest.

pu.ss: (jy prmwqmw bn ivc ivcrn Aqy Pl-Pul Kwx nwl imldw hovy qw) A`k nUM Kwx vwly, Pl-Pul nUM B`Cx vwly, Aqy sdw bn ivc iPrn vwly bkry (bok) vrgw koeI hor dUjw nhIN hY।
pu.bdb: (jy prmwqmw bn ivc ivcrn Aqy Pl-Pul Kwx nwl imldw hovy qw) A`k nUM Kwx vwly, Pl-Pul nUM B`Cx vwly, Aqy sdw bn ivc iPrn vwly bkry (bok) vrgw koeI hor dUjw nhIN hY।

transliteration.en: aak ko chara'yaa fal fool ko bhachha'yaa sadhaa ban kau bhrama'yaa aauar dhoosaro na bok sau ||
transliteration.hi: आक को चरय्या फल फूल को भछय्या सदा बन कौ भ्रमय्या और दूसरो न बोक सौ ॥
transliteration.ur: آک کو چرّےا پھل پھُول کو بھچھّےا سدا بن کَو بھرمّےا اَور دُوسرو ن بوک سَو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khw BXo Byf jau Gs`q sIs ibRC`n soN mwtI ko BC`Xw bol pUC lIjY jok sO ]

en.bdb: If the Lord meets by rubbing the head with the trees in order to remove drowsiness, then the sheep always rubs its head with the trees and if the Lord meets by eating the earth, then you can ask the leech.

pu.ss: kI hoieAw jy Byf sdw Awpxw isr ibRCw nwl rgVdI iPrdI hY (pr m`Qw rgVn nwl pRBU nhIN imldw) Aqy jy im`tI dy KwiDAW (prmwqmw imldw huMdw qw) im`tI nUM Kwx vwlI jok nUM puC vyKo।
pu.bdb: kI hoieAw jy Byf sdw Awpxw isr ibRCw nwl rgVdI iPrdI hY (pr m`Qw rgVn nwl pRBU nhIN imldw) Aqy jy im`tI dy KwiDAW (prmwqmw imldw huMdw qw) im`tI nUM Kwx vwlI jok nUM puC vyKo।

transliteration.en: kahaa bhayo bhedd jau ghasa't sees birachha'n so(n) maaTee ko bhachha'yaa bol poochh leejai jok sau ||
transliteration.hi: कहा भयो भेड जउ घसत्त सीस बृछन्न सों माटी को भछय्या बोल पूछ लीजै जोक सौ ॥
transliteration.ur: کها بھےو بھےڈ جا گھسّت سیِس برچھّن سوں ماٹیِ کو بھچھّےا بول پُوچھ لیِجَے جوک سَو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kwmnw ADIn kwm kRoD mYN pRbIn eyk Bwvnw ibhIn kYsy BytY prlok sO ]10]80]

en.bdb: How can one meet the Lord in the next world, who is subservient to desire, active in lust and anger and without faith? 10.80.

pu.ss: jo ivAkqI kwmnwvw dy ADIn hY Aqy kwmkRoD ivc pRbIn hY, (pr) iek Bwvnw qoN vwiJAw hY qw auh bRhmlok ('prlok') nUM ikvyW pRwpq kr skdw hY ]10]80]
pu.bdb: jo ivAkqI kwmnwvw dy ADIn hY Aqy kwmkRoD ivc pRbIn hY, (pr) iek Bwvnw qoN vwiJAw hY qw auh bRhmlok ('prlok') nUM ikvyW pRwpq kr skdw hY ]10]80]

transliteration.en: kaamanaa adheen kaam krodh mai(n) prabeen ek bhaavanaa biheen kaise bheTai paralok sau ||10||80||
transliteration.hi: कामना अधीन काम क्रोध मैं प्रबीन एक भावना बिहीन कैसे भेटै परलोक सौ ॥१०॥८०॥
transliteration.ur: کامنا ادھیٍن کام کرودھ مَےں پربیٍن اےک بھاونا بهیٍن کَےسے بھےٹَے پرلوک سَو ۔۔۱۰۔۔۸۰۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nwicE eI krq mor dwdr krq sor sdw GnGor Gn kirE eI krq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realised by dancing and shouting, then pecock dances, the frog croaks and the clouds thunder.

pu.ss: (jy n`cx Aqy Sor pwaux nwl prmwqmw imldw hovy qw) mor nicAw krdw hY Aqy f`fU rOlw pwauWdy hn Aqy bdl sdw gijAw krdy hn।
pu.bdb: (jy n`cx Aqy Sor pwaux nwl prmwqmw imldw hovy qw) mor nicAw krdw hY Aqy f`fU rOlw pwauWdy hn Aqy bdl sdw gijAw krdy hn।

transliteration.en: naachio iee karat mor dhaadhar karat sor sadhaa ghanaghor ghan kario iee karat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: नाचिओ ई करत मोर दादर करत सोर सदा घनघोर घन करिओ ई करत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ناچاو ای کرت مور دادر کرت سور سدا گھنگھور گھن کراو ای کرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: eyk pwie TwFy sdw bn mY rhq ibRC PUk PUk pwv BUm sRwvg Drq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord meets by standing on one leg, then the tree stands on one foot in the forest, and if the Lord meets on observing non-violence, then the Sravak (aina monk) places his feet very cautiously on the earth.

pu.ss: (jy iek pYr auqy KVoiqAW prmwqmw imldw hovy qw) bn ivc ibRC sdw iek pYr dy Bwr qy KVy rihMdy hn (Aqy jy jIvw nUM duK nw id`iqAW pRBU imldw hovy qw) sRyvVy DrqI auqy hUMJ hUMJ (PUk PUk ky) pYr Drdy hn।
pu.bdb: (jy iek pYr auqy KVoiqAW prmwqmw imldw hovy qw) bn ivc ibRC sdw iek pYr dy Bwr qy KVy rihMdy hn (Aqy jy jIvw nUM duK nw id`iqAW pRBU imldw hovy qw) sRyvVy DrqI auqy hUMJ hUMJ (PUk PUk ky) pYr Drdy hn।

transliteration.en: ek pai Thaadde sadhaa ban mai rahat birachh fook fook paav bhoom sraavag dharat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: एक पाइ ठाढे सदा बन मै रहत बृछ फूक फूक पाव भूम स्रावग धरत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: اےک پاا ٹھاڈھے سدا بن مَے رهت برچھ پھُوک پھُوک پاو بھُوم سراوگ دھرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pwhn Anyk jug eyk Taur bwsu krY kwg Aaur cIl dys dys ibcrq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord is realised by not moving from one place or by wandering, then the stone remains at one place for many ages and the crow and kite continue wandering in several countries.

pu.ss: (jy iek sQwn auqy itky rihx nwl pRBU imldw hovy qw) p`Qr Anyk Xugw qk iek Qw auqy vws krdy hn Aqy (jy GuMmx iPrn nwl pRBU imldw hovy qw) kw Aqy ie`lw (sdw) dys-dyswqrw ivc ivcrdy rihMdy hn।
pu.bdb: (jy iek sQwn auqy itky rihx nwl pRBU imldw hovy qw) p`Qr Anyk Xugw qk iek Qw auqy vws krdy hn Aqy (jy GuMmx iPrn nwl pRBU imldw hovy qw) kw Aqy ie`lw (sdw) dys-dyswqrw ivc ivcrdy rihMdy hn।

transliteration.en: paahan anek jug ek Thaur baas karai kaag aaur cheel dhes dhes bicharat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: पाहन अनेक जुग एक ठउर बासु करै काग अउर चील देस देस बिचरत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: پاهن انےک جُگ اےک ٹھار باس کرَے کاگ اار چیِل دےس دےس بچرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: igAwn ky ibhIn mhw dwn mY n hUjY lIn Bwvnw XkIn dIn kYsy kY qrq hYN ]11]81]

en.bdb: When a person without knowledge cannot merge in the Supreme Lorrd, then how can these devoid of trust and faith ferry across the world-ocean?11.81.

pu.ss: (ijvyW) bRhm igAwn qoN rihq ivAkqI mhwdwnI (prmwqmw) ivc lIn nhIN ho skdw, ausy qrRhw pRym Aqy SrDw qoN sKxy ivAkqI (sMswr swgr nUM) ikvyW qr skdy hn ]11]81]
pu.bdb: (ijvyW) bRhm igAwn qoN rihq ivAkqI mhwdwnI (prmwqmw) ivc lIn nhIN ho skdw, ausy qrRhw pRym Aqy SrDw qoN sKxy ivAkqI (sMswr swgr nUM) ikvyW qr skdy hn ]11]81]

transliteration.en: giaan ke biheen mahaa dhaan mai na hoojai leen bhaavanaa yakeen dheen kaise kai tarat hai(n) ||11||81||
transliteration.hi: गिआन के बिहीन महा दान मै न हूजै लीन भावना यकीन दीन कैसे कै तरत हैं ॥११॥८१॥
transliteration.ur: گِآن کے بهیٍن مها دان مَے ن هُوجَے لیٍن بھاونا ےکیٍن دیٍن کَےسے کَے ترت هَےں ۔۔۱۱۔۔۸۱۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jYsy eyk sÍWgI khUM jogIAw bYrwgI bnY kbhUM sinAws Bys bn kY idKwveI ]

en.bdb: Just as an actor sometimes becomes a Yogi, sometimes a Bairagi (recluse) and sometimes shows himself in the guise of a Sannyasi (mendicant).

pu.ss: ijvyW iek bhurUpIAw kdy jogI Aqy kdy bYrwgI bxdw hY Aqy kdy sMinAwsI Bys Dwrn kr ky ivKwauWdw hY।
pu.bdb: ijvyW iek bhurUpIAw kdy jogI Aqy kdy bYrwgI bxdw hY Aqy kdy sMinAwsI Bys Dwrn kr ky ivKwauWdw hY।

transliteration.en: jaise ek savaiaa(n)gee kahoo(n) jogeeaa bairaagee banai kabahoo(n) saniaas bhes ban kai dhikhaaviee ||
transliteration.hi: जैसे एक स्वाँगी कहूँ जोगीआ बैरागी बनै कबहूँ सनिआस भेस बन कै दिखावई ॥
transliteration.ur: جَےسے اےک سواںگیِ کهُوں جوگیِآ بَےراگیِ بنَے کبهُوں سنآس بھےس بن کَے دکھاوای ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM paunhwrI khUM bYTy lwie qwrI khUM loB kI KumwrI sON Anyk gun gwveI ]

en.bdb: Sometimes he becomes a person subsisting on air, sometimes sits observing abstract meditation and sometimes under the intoxication greed, sings praises of many kinds.

pu.ss: kdy pOx-AwhwrI Aqy kdy smwDI ('qwrI'-qwVI) lgw ky bYTdw hY Aqy kdy loB dI KumwrI kwrn Anyk gux gwauWdw hY।
pu.bdb: kdy pOx-AwhwrI Aqy kdy smwDI ('qwrI'-qwVI) lgw ky bYTdw hY Aqy kdy loB dI KumwrI kwrn Anyk gux gwauWdw hY।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) paunahaaree kahoo(n) baiThe lai taaree kahoo(n) lobh kee khumaaree saua(n) anek gun gaaviee ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ पउनहारी कहूँ बैठे लाइ तारी कहूँ लोभ की खुमारी सौं अनेक गुन गावई ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں پانهاریِ کهُوں بَےٹھے لاا تاریِ کهُوں لوبھ کیِ کھُماریِ سَوں انےک گُن گاوای ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khUM bRhmcwrI khUM hwQ pY lgwvY bwrI khUM fMf DwrI huie kY logn BRmwveI ]

en.bdb: Sometimes he becomes a Brahmchari (student observing celibacy), sometimes shows his promptness and sometimes becoming a staff- bearing hermit deludes the people.

pu.ss: kdy bRhmcwrI huMdw hY, kdy h`Q auqy KyqI jMmw ky ivKwauWdw hY Aqy kdy dMfDwrI bx ky lokw nUM BrmwauWdw hY।
pu.bdb: kdy bRhmcwrI huMdw hY, kdy h`Q auqy KyqI jMmw ky ivKwauWdw hY Aqy kdy dMfDwrI bx ky lokw nUM BrmwauWdw hY।

transliteration.en: kahoo(n) brahamachaaree kahoo(n) haath pai lagaavai baaree kahoo(n) dda(n)dd dhaaree hui kai logan bhramaaviee ||
transliteration.hi: कहूँ ब्रहमचारी कहूँ हाथ पै लगावै बारी कहूँ डंड धारी हुइ कै लोगन भ्रमावई ॥
transliteration.ur: کهُوں برهمچاریِ کهُوں هاتھ پَے لگاوَے باریِ کهُوں ڈںڈ دھاریِ هُا کَے لوگن بھرماوای ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kwmnw ADIn pirE nwcq hY nwcn soN igAwn ky ibhIn kYsy bRhm lok pwveI ]12]82]

en.bdb: He dances becoming subordinate to passions how will he be able to attain an entry into Lord’s Abode without knowledge?.12.82.

pu.ss: (jo) kwmnwvw dy vs ho ky ncdw hY, (Blw) igAwn qoN ibnw kyvl n`cx nwl ikvyW bRhm-lok dI pRwpqI ho skdI hY ]12]82]
pu.bdb: (jo) kwmnwvw dy vs ho ky ncdw hY, (Blw) igAwn qoN ibnw kyvl n`cx nwl ikvyW bRhm-lok dI pRwpqI ho skdI hY ]12]82]

transliteration.en: kaamanaa adheen pario naachat hai naachan so(n) giaan ke biheen kaise braham lok paaviee ||12||82||
transliteration.hi: कामना अधीन परिओ नाचत है नाचन सों गिआन के बिहीन कैसे ब्रहम लोक पावई ॥१२॥८२॥
transliteration.ur: کامنا ادھیٍن پراو ناچت هَے ناچن سوں گآن کے بهیٍن کَےسے برهم لوک پاوای ۔۔۱۲۔۔۸۲۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: pMc bwr gIdr pukwry pry sIqkwl kuMcr AO gdhw Anykdw pRkwr hIN ]

en.bdb: If the jackal howls for five times, then either the winter sets in or there is famine, but nothing happens if the elephant trumpets and ass brays many times. (Similarly the actions of a knowledgeable person are fruitful and those of an ignorant one are fr

pu.ss: (ijvyW) srdI dI ruq ivc igdV pMj vyly huAW huAW krdw hY Aqy hwQI qy Koqw Anykw vwr icMGwVdy Aqy hINgdy hn (pr aunHw nUM kuJ vI hwsl nhIN huMdw)।
pu.bdb: (ijvyW) srdI dI ruq ivc igdV pMj vyly huAW huAW krdw hY Aqy hwQI qy Koqw Anykw vwr icMGwVdy Aqy hINgdy hn (pr aunHw nUM kuJ vI hwsl nhIN huMdw)।

transliteration.en: pa(n)ch baar geedhar pukaare pare seetakaal ku(n)char aau gadhahaa anekadhaa prakaar hee(n) ||
transliteration.hi: पंच बार गीदर पुकारे परे सीतकाल कुँचर औ गदहा अनेकदा प्रकार हीं ॥
transliteration.ur: پںچ بار گیِدر پُکارے پرے سیِتکال کُںچر اَو گدها انےکدا پرکار هیِں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khw BXo jo pY klvqR lIE kWsI bIc cIr cIr cortw kuTwrn soN mwr hI ]

en.bdb: If one observes the ritual of sawing at Kashi, nothing will happen, because a chief is slayed and sawed several times with axes.

pu.ss: kI hoieAw jy kr kwSI (bnwrs) ivc klvqR (nwl SrIr icrvw) ilAw (ikauN ik keI vwr) cor nUM vI kuhwVIAW nwl cIr cIr ky mwr id`qw jwdw hY।
pu.bdb: kI hoieAw jy kr kwSI (bnwrs) ivc klvqR (nwl SrIr icrvw) ilAw (ikauN ik keI vwr) cor nUM vI kuhwVIAW nwl cIr cIr ky mwr id`qw jwdw hY।

transliteration.en: kahaa bhayo jo pai kalavatr leeo kaa(n)see beech cheer cheer choraTaa kuThaaran so(n) maar hee ||
transliteration.hi: कहा भयो जो पै कलवत्र लीओ काँसी बीच चीर चीर चोरटा कुठारन सों मार ही ॥
transliteration.ur: کها بھےو جو پَے کلوتر لیِاو کاںسیِ بیِچ چیِر چیِر چورٹا کُٹھارن سوں مار هیِ ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: khw BXo PWsI fwir bUifE jV gMg Dwir fwir fwir PWs Tg mwir mwir fwr hIN ]

en.bdb: If a fool, with a noose around his neck, is drowned on the current of Ganges, nothing will happen, because several times the dacoits kill the wayfarer by putting the noose around his neck.

pu.ss: kI hoieAw (jy koeI) mUrK (Awpxy gl ivc) PwhI pw ky gMgw dI Dwrw ivc ruV igAw hY (ikauWik keI vwr) Tg log (rwhIAW ny gly ivc) PwhI pw ky mwr idMdy hn।
pu.bdb: kI hoieAw (jy koeI) mUrK (Awpxy gl ivc) PwhI pw ky gMgw dI Dwrw ivc ruV igAw hY (ikauWik keI vwr) Tg log (rwhIAW ny gly ivc) PwhI pw ky mwr idMdy hn।

transliteration.en: kahaa bhayo faa(n)see ddaar booddio jaR ga(n)g dhaar ddaar ddaar faa(n)s Thag maar maar ddaar hee(n) ||
transliteration.hi: कहा भयो फाँसी डारि बूडिओ जड़ गंग धारि डारि डारि फाँस ठग मारि मारि डार हीं ॥
transliteration.ur: کها بھےو پھاںسیِ ڈار بُوڈاو جڑ گںگ دھار ڈار ڈار پھاںس ٹھگ مار مار ڈار هیِں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: fUby nrk Dwr mUVH igAwn ky ibnw ibcwr Bwvnw ibhIn kYsy igAwn ko ibcwr hIN ]13]83]

en.bdb: The fools have drowned in the current of hell without deliberations of knowledge, because how can a faithless person comprehend the concepts of knowledge?.13.83.

pu.ss: igAwn nUM ibnw ivcwry (keI) mUrK ivAkqI nrk dI Dwrw ivc fub jwdy hn (ikauWik) Bwvnw qoN ibnw igAwn nUM (ikvyW) ivcwirAw jw skdw hY ]13]83]

transliteration.en: ddoobe narak dhaar mooRh giaan ke binaa bichaar bhaavanaa biheen kaise giaan ko bichaar hee(n) ||13||83||
transliteration.hi: डूबे नरक धार मूड़्ह गिआन के बिना बिचार भावना बिहीन कैसे गिआन को बिचार हीं ॥१३॥८३॥
transliteration.ur: ڈُوبے نرک دھار مُوڑھ گآن کے بنا بچار بھاونا بهیٍن کَےسے گآن کو بچار هیِں ۔۔۱۳۔۔۸۳۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qwp ky shy qy jo pY pweIAY Aqwp nwQ qwpnw Anyk qn Gwiel shq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Blissful Lord is realised by the endurance of sufferings, then a wounded person endures several types of sufferings on his body.

pu.ss: jy kr SrIrk duK (qwp) shwrn nwl duKw qoN au`cy suAwmI nwl myl ho skdw hovy, qw Gwiel ivAkqI Anyk pRkwr dy duK (qwp) SrIr auqy sihn krdw hY।
pu.bdb: jy kr SrIrk duK (qwp) shwrn nwl duKw qoN au`cy suAwmI nwl myl ho skdw hovy, qw Gwiel ivAkqI Anyk pRkwr dy duK (qwp) SrIr auqy sihn krdw hY।

transliteration.en: taap ke sahe te jo pai paieeaai ataap naath taapanaa anek tan ghail sahat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: ताप के सहे ते जो पै पाईऐ अताप नाथ तापना अनेक तन घाइल सहत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: تاپ کے سهے تے جو پَے پاایاَے اتاپ ناتھ تاپنا انےک تن گھاال سهت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jwp ky kIey qy jo pY pwXq Ajwp dyv pUdnw sdIv quhIN quhIN aucrq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the unmutterable Lord can be realised by the repetition of His Name, then a small bird called pudana repeats “Tuhi, Tuhi” (Thou art everyting) all the time.

pu.ss: jy jpu kIiqAW jp-AqIq prmwqmw nUM pwieAw jw skdw hovy qw pUdnw (iek ivSyS pMCI) sdw 'quhI-quhI' aucwrdw rihMdw hY।
pu.bdb: jy jpu kIiqAW jp-AqIq prmwqmw nUM pwieAw jw skdw hovy qw pUdnw (iek ivSyS pMCI) sdw 'quhI-quhI' aucwrdw rihMdw hY।

transliteration.en: jaap ke ke'ee te jo pai paayat ajaap dhev poodhanaa sadheev tuhee(n) tuhee(n) ucharat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जाप के कीए ते जो पै पायत अजाप देव पूदना सदीव तुहीं तुहीं उचरत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: جاپ کے کیِاے تے جو پَے پاےت اجاپ دےو پُودنا سدیِو تُهیِں تُهیِں اُچرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nB ky aufy qy jo pY nwrwiex pweIXq Anl Akws pMCI folbo krq hYN ]

en.bdb: If the Lord can be realised by flying in the sky, then the phonix always flies in the sky.

pu.ss: AwkwS ivc aufx nwl jy nwrwiex pRwpq ho skdw hovy qw Anl pMCI (sdw) AwkwS ivc hI aufwrIAW lgwauWdw rihMdw hY।
pu.bdb: AwkwS ivc aufx nwl jy nwrwiex pRwpq ho skdw hovy qw Anl pMCI (sdw) AwkwS ivc hI aufwrIAW lgwauWdw rihMdw hY।

transliteration.en: nabh ke udde te jo pai naarain paieeyat anal akaas pa(n)chhee ddolabo karat hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: नभ के उडे ते जो पै नाराइण पाईयत अनल अकास पंछी डोलबो करत हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: نبھ کے اُڈے تے جو پَے نارااݨ پاایےت انل اکاس پںچھیِ ڈولبو کرت هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Awg mY jry qy giq rWf kI prq kr pqwl ky bwsI ikau BujMg n qrq hYN ]14]84]

en.bdb: If the salvation is attained by burning oneself in fire, then the woman burning herself on the funeral pyre of her husband (Sati) should get salvation and if one achieves liberation by residing in a cave, then why the serpents residing in the nether-world

pu.ss: jy A`g ivc sVn nwl mukqI imldI huMdI (qw) A`g ivc ivDvw nUM pqI nwl sqI hox qy mukqI imlxI cwhIdI hY (Aqy jy guPw ivc rihx nwl mukqI imldI hovy qw) pwqwl ivc invws krn vwly s`p ikauW mukq nhIN huMdy ]14]84]
pu.bdb: jy A`g ivc sVn nwl mukqI imldI huMdI (qw) A`g ivc ivDvw nUM pqI nwl sqI hox qy mukqI imlxI cwhIdI hY (Aqy jy guPw ivc rihx nwl mukqI imldI hovy qw) pwqwl ivc invws krn vwly s`p ikauW mukq nhIN huMdy ]14]84]

transliteration.en: aag mai jare te gat raa(n)dd kee parat kar pataal ke baasee kiau bhuja(n)g na tarat hai(n) ||14||84||
transliteration.hi: आग मै जरे ते गति राँड की परत कर पताल के बासी किउ भुजंग न तरत हैं ॥१४॥८४॥
transliteration.ur: آگ مَے جرے تے گت راںڈ کیِ پرت کر پتال کے باسیِ کا بھُجںگ ن ترت هَےں ۔۔۱۴۔۔۸۴۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: koaU BieE muMfIAw sMinAwsI koaU jogI BieE koaU bRhmcwrI koaU jqI Anumwnbo ]

en.bdb: Somebody became a Bairagi (recluse), somebody a Sannyasi (mendicant). Somebody a Yogi, somebody a Brahmchari (student observing celibacy) and someone is considered a celibate.

pu.ss: koeI (rwmwnMdI) bYrwgI bixAw hoieAw hY, koeI sMinAwsI Aqy koeI jogI bx igAw hY, koeI bRhmcwrI Aqy koeI jqI idsdw hY।
pu.bdb: koeI (rwmwnMdI) bYrwgI bixAw hoieAw hY, koeI sMinAwsI Aqy koeI jogI bx igAw hY, koeI bRhmcwrI Aqy koeI jqI idsdw hY।

transliteration.en: kouoo bhio mu(n)ddeeaa sa(n)niaasee kouoo jogee bhio kouoo brahamachaaree kouoo jatee anumaanabo ||
transliteration.hi: कोऊ भइओ मुँडीआ संनिआसी कोऊ जोगी भइओ कोऊ ब्रहमचारी कोऊ जती अनुमानबो ॥
transliteration.ur: کواُو بھِااو مُںڈیِآ سنّآسیِ کواُو جوگیِ بھِااو کواُو برهمچاریِ کواُو جتیِ انمانبو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ihMdU qurk koaU rwPjI iemwm swPI mwns kI jwiq sbY eykY pihcwnbo ]

en.bdb: Someone is Hindu and someone a Muslim, then someone is Shia, and someone a Sunni, but all the human beings, as a species, are recognized as one and the same.

pu.ss: koeI ihMdU hY, koeI qurk, koeI SIAw ('rw&jI') hY Aqy koeI suMnI ('iemwmswPI') (pr) swry mnu`K dI pYdwieS AQvw jwiq hn (ies leI ienHw swirAW nUM) ieko ijhw smJxw cwhIdw hY।
pu.bdb: koeI ihMdU hY, koeI qurk, koeI SIAw ('rw&jI') hY Aqy koeI suMnI ('iemwmswPI') (pr) swry mnu`K dI pYdwieS AQvw jwiq hn (ies leI ienHw swirAW nUM) ieko ijhw smJxw cwhIdw hY।

transliteration.en: hi(n)dhoo turak kouoo raafajee imaam saafee maanas kee jaat sabai ekai pahichaanabo ||
transliteration.hi: हिंदू तुरक कोऊ राफजी इमाम साफी मानस की जाति सबै एकै पहिचानबो ॥
transliteration.ur: هِںدُو تُرک کواُو راپھجیِ امام ساپھیِ مانس کیِ جات سبَے اےکَے پهِچانبو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: krqw krIm soeI rwjk rhIm EeI dUsro n Byd koeI BUl BRm mwnbo ]

en.bdb: Karta (The Creator) and Karim (Merciful) is the same Lord, Razak (The Sustainer) and Rahim (Compassionate) is the same Lord, there is no other second, therefore consider this verbal distinguishing feature of Hindusim and Islam as an error and an illusion.

pu.ss: (sB dw) krqw auhI ikRpwlU hY Aqy rozI dyx vwlw idAwlU vI auhI hY। (ienHw ivc) hor koeI AMqr smJx dy Brm ivc nhIN pYxw cwhIdw।
pu.bdb: (sB dw) krqw auhI ikRpwlU hY Aqy rozI dyx vwlw idAwlU vI auhI hY। (ienHw ivc) hor koeI AMqr smJx dy Brm ivc nhIN pYxw cwhIdw।

transliteration.en: karataa kareem soiee raajak raheem oiee dhoosaro na bhedh koiee bhool bhram maanabo ||
transliteration.hi: करता करीम सोई राजक रहीम ओई दूसरो न भेद कोई भूल भ्रम मानबो ॥
transliteration.ur: کرتا کریِم سوای راجک رهیِم اوای دُوسرو ن بھےد کوای بھُول بھرم مانبو ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: eyk hI kI syv sB hI ko gurdyv eyk eyk hI srUp sbY eykY joq jwnbo ]15]85]

en.bdb: Thus worship the ONE LORD, who is the common enlightener of all all have been created in His Image and amongst all comprehend the same ONE LIGHT. 15.85.

pu.ss: ieko dI hI syvw (kro) (ikauWik) sB dw (auh) gurU ieko hI hY, swry ieko dw srUp hn, (swirAW ivc) ieko joiq smJxI cwhIdI hY ]15]85]
pu.bdb: ieko dI hI syvw (kro) (ikauWik) sB dw (auh) gurU ieko hI hY, swry ieko dw srUp hn, (swirAW ivc) ieko joiq smJxI cwhIdI hY ]15]85]

transliteration.en: ek hee kee sev sabh hee ko gurdhev ek ek hee saroop sabai ekai jot jaanabo ||15||85||
transliteration.hi: एक ही की सेव सभ ही को गुरदेव एक एक ही सरूप सबै एकै जोत जानबो ॥१५॥८५॥
transliteration.ur: اےک هیِ کیِ سےو سبھ هیِ کو گُردےو اےک اےک هیِ سرُوپ سبَے اےکَے جوت جانبو ۔۔۱۵۔۔۸۵۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: dyhrw msIq soeI pUjw AO invwj EeI mwns sbY eyk pY Anyk ko BRmwau hY ]

en.bdb: The temple and the mosque are the same, there is no difference between a Hindu worship and Muslim prayer all the human beings are the same, but the illusion is of various types.

pu.ss: mMidr Aqy msijd auhI hY Aqy pUjw Aqy nmwz vI auhI hY, mnu`K swry iek hn, pr Anykqw dw BulyKw pYNdw hY।
pu.bdb: mMidr Aqy msijd auhI hY Aqy pUjw Aqy nmwz vI auhI hY, mnu`K swry iek hn, pr Anykqw dw BulyKw pYNdw hY।

transliteration.en: dheharaa maseet soiee poojaa aau nivaaj oiee maanas sabai ek pai anek ko bhramaau hai ||
transliteration.hi: देहरा मसीत सोई पूजा औ निवाज ओई मानस सबै एक पै अनेक को भ्रमाउ है ॥
transliteration.ur: دےهرا مسیِت سوای پُوجا اَو نواج اوای مانس سبَے اےک پَے انےک کو بھرماا هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: dyvqw Adyv j`C gMDRb qurk ihMdU inAwry inAwry dysn ky Bys ko pRBwau hY ]

en.bdb: The gods, demons, Yakshas, Gandharvas, Turks and Hindus… all these are due to the differences of the various garbs of different countries.

pu.ss: dyvqy, dYNq, XkS, gMDrb, muslmwn Aqy ihMdU (jo iBMn iBMn pRqIq huMdy hn, ies dw kwrn Asl ivc) vKry vKry dysw dy pihrwvy dw pRBwv hY।
pu.bdb: dyvqy, dYNq, XkS, gMDrb, muslmwn Aqy ihMdU (jo iBMn iBMn pRqIq huMdy hn, ies dw kwrn Asl ivc) vKry vKry dysw dy pihrwvy dw pRBwv hY।

transliteration.en: dhevataa adhev ja'chh ga(n)dhrab turak hi(n)dhoo niaare niaare dhesan ke bhes ko prabhaau hai ||
transliteration.hi: देवता अदेव जच्छ गंध्रब तुरक हिंदू निआरे निआरे देसन के भेस को प्रभाउ है ॥
transliteration.ur: دےوتا ادےو جّچھ گںدھرب تُرک هںدُو نآرے نآرے دےسن کے بھےس کو پربھاا هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: eykY nYn eykY kwn eykY dyh eykY bwn Kwk bwd Awqs AO Awb ko rlwau hY ]

en.bdb: The eyes are the same, the ears the same, the bodies are the same and the habits are the same, all the creation is the amalgam of earth, air, fire and water.

pu.ss: (sB dIAW) A`Kw ieko ijhIAW hn, kMn ieko ijhy hn, SrIr ieko ijhy hn Aqy bolx SkqI iek smwn hY (ikauWik swirAW dI rcnw) im`tI, pOx (bwd) AgnI Aqy jl dy myl nwl hoeI hY।
pu.bdb: (sB dIAW) A`Kw ieko ijhIAW hn, kMn ieko ijhy hn, SrIr ieko ijhy hn Aqy bolx SkqI iek smwn hY (ikauWik swirAW dI rcnw) im`tI, pOx (bwd) AgnI Aqy jl dy myl nwl hoeI hY।

transliteration.en: ekai nain ekai kaan ekai dheh ekai baan khaak baadh aatas aau aab ko ralaau hai ||
transliteration.hi: एकै नैन एकै कान एकै देह एकै बान खाक बाद आतस औ आब को रलाउ है ॥
transliteration.ur: اےکَے نَےن اےکَے کان اےکَے دےه اےکَے بان کھاک باد آتس اَو آب کو رلاا هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Alh AByK soeI purwn AO kurwn EeI eyk hI srUp sBY eyk hI bnwau hY ]16]86]

en.bdb: Allah of Muslims and Abhekh (Guiseless) of Hindus are the same, the Puranas of Hindus and the holy Quran of the Muslims depict the same reality all have been created in the image of the same Lord and have the same formation. 16.86.

pu.ss: A`lwh (ieslwmI prm s`qw) Aqy AByK (ihMdU prm s`qw) auhI hY, kurwn Aqy purwx vI auhI hY (ikauWik) ieh swry iek dw hI srUp hn Aqy swirAW dI bnwvt iek-smwn hY ]16]86]
pu.bdb: A`lwh (ieslwmI prm s`qw) Aqy AByK (ihMdU prm s`qw) auhI hY, kurwn Aqy purwx vI auhI hY (ikauWik) ieh swry iek dw hI srUp hn Aqy swirAW dI bnwvt iek-smwn hY ]16]86]

transliteration.en: aleh abhekh soiee puraan aau kuraan oiee ek hee saroop sabhai ek hee banaau hai ||16||86||
transliteration.hi: अलह अभेख सोई पुरान औ कुरान ओई एक ही सरूप सभै एक ही बनाउ है ॥१६॥८६॥
transliteration.ur: اله ابھےکھ سوای پُران اَو کُران اوای اےک هیِ سرُوپ سبھَے اےک هیِ بناا هَے ۔۔۱۶۔۔۸۶۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jYsy eyk Awg qy knUkw kot Awg auTy inAwry inAwry huie kY Pyir Awg mY imlwihˆgy ]

en.bdb: Just as millions of sparks are created from the fire although they are different entities, they merge in the same fire.

pu.ss: ijvyN A`g qoN kroVw icxgw ('knUkw') pYdw huMdIAW hn Aqy v`KrI v`KrI hoNd drsw ky iPr A`g ivc hI iml jwdIAW hn;
pu.bdb: ijvyN A`g qoN kroVw icxgw ('knUkw') pYdw huMdIAW hn Aqy v`KrI v`KrI hoNd drsw ky iPr A`g ivc hI iml jwdIAW hn;

transliteration.en: jaise ek aag te kanookaa koT aag uThe niaare niaare hui kai fer aag mai milaahi(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: जैसे एक आग ते कनूका कोट आग उठे निआरे निआरे हुइ कै फेरि आग मै मिलाहिंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: جَےسے اےک آگ تے کنُوکا کوٹ آگ اُٹھے نآرے نآرے هُا کَے پھےر آگ مَے ملاهˆگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jYsy eyk DUr qy Anyk DUr pUrq hY DUr ky knUkw Pyr DUr hI smwihˆgy ]

en.bdb: Just as many creatures are born from dirt and eventually become dirt again.

pu.ss: ijvyN DUV ivcoN Anyk z`ry pYdw huMdy hn Aqy DUV dy auh z`ry iPr DUV ivc hI smw jwdy hn;
pu.bdb: ijvyN DUV ivcoN Anyk z`ry pYdw huMdy hn Aqy DUV dy auh z`ry iPr DUV ivc hI smw jwdy hn;

transliteration.en: jaise ek dhoor te anek dhoor poorat hai dhoor ke kanookaa fer dhoor hee samaahi(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: जैसे एक धूर ते अनेक धूर पूरत है धूर के कनूका फेर धूर ही समाहिंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: جَےسے اےک دھُور تے انےک دھُور پُورت هَے دھُور کے کنُوکا پھےر دھُور هیِ سماهˆگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jYsy eyk nd qy qrMg kot aupjq hYN pwn ky qrMg sbY pwn hI khwihNgy ]

en.bdb: Just as from of waves are created on the surface of the big rivers and all the waves are called water.

pu.ss: ijvyW iek smuMdr qoN kroVw qrMgw pYdw huMdIAW hn, pr pwxI dIAW swrIAW lihrw pwxI hI AKvwauWdIAW hn;
pu.bdb: ijvyW iek smuMdr qoN kroVw qrMgw pYdw huMdIAW hn, pr pwxI dIAW swrIAW lihrw pwxI hI AKvwauWdIAW hn;

transliteration.en: jaise ek nadh te tara(n)g koT upajat hai(n) paan ke tara(n)g sabai paan hee kahaahi(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: जैसे एक नद ते तरंग कोट उपजत हैं पान के तरंग सबै पान ही कहाहिंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: جَےسے اےک ند تے ترںگ کوٹ اُپجت هَےں پان کے ترںگ سبَے پان هیِ کهاهںگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qYsy ibsÍ rUp qy ABUq BUq pRgt huie qwhI qy aupj sbY qwhI mY smwihˆgy ]17]87]

en.bdb: Similarly the animate and inanimate objects come out of the Supreme Lord having been created from the same Lord, they merge in the same Lord. 17.87.

pu.ss: iqvyW aus ivrwt prmwqmw qoN sUKm Aqy sQUl (jV-cyqn) pYdw ho ky, aus qoN aupj ky iPr ausy ivc smw jwdy hn ]17]87]
pu.bdb: iqvyW aus ivrwt prmwqmw qoN sUKm Aqy sQUl (jV-cyqn) pYdw ho ky, aus qoN aupj ky iPr ausy ivc smw jwdy hn ]17]87]

transliteration.en: taise bisavai roop te abhoot bhoot pragaT hui taahee te upaj sabai taahee mai samaahi(n)ge ||17||87||
transliteration.hi: तैसे बिस्व रूप ते अभूत भूत प्रगट हुइ ताही ते उपज सबै ताही मै समाहिंगे ॥१७॥८७॥
transliteration.ur: تَےسے بسو رُوپ تے ابھُوت بھُوت پرگٹ هُا تاهیِ تے اُپج سبَے تاهیِ مَے سماهˆگے ۔۔۱۷۔۔۸۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: kyqy k`C m`C kyqy aun kau krq B`C kyqy A`C v`C huie sp`C auf jwihˆgy ]

en.bdb: There are many a tortoise and fish and there are many who devour them there are many a winged phoenix, who always continue flying.

pu.ss: ikqny hI k`CU Aqy m`C hn, ikqny hI aunHw nUM Kwx vwly hn, ikqny hI gruV, Anl Awid pMCI, KMBw vwly ho ky auf jwxgy।

transliteration.en: kete ka'chh ma'chh kete un kau karat bha'chh kete a'chh va'chh hui sapa'chh udd jaahi(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: केते कच्छ मच्छ केते उन कउ करत भच्छ केते अच्छ वच्छ हुइ सपच्छ उड जाहिंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: کےتے کّچھ مّچھ کےتے اُن کا کرت بھّچھ کےتے اّچھ وّچھ هُا سپّچھ اُڈ جاهˆگے ۔۔

en.bdb: There are many who devour even the phonenix in the sky and there are many, who even eat and digest the materialized devourers.

pu.ss: ikqny hI AwkwS ivc gruV, Anl Awid pMCIAW dw B`Cx krngy Aqy ikny hI pRgt ho ky (aunHw nUM) Kw ky pcw jwxgy।

transliteration.en: kete nabh beech a'chh pa'chh kau karai(n)ge bha'chh ketak pra'tachh hui pachai khai jaahi(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: केते नभ बीच अच्छ पच्छ कउ करैंगे भच्छ केतक प्रत्तछ हुइ पचाइ खाइ जाहिंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: کےتے نبھ بیِچ اّچھ پّچھ کا کرَےںگے بھّچھ کےتک پرّتچھ هُا پچاا کھاا جاهˆگے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: jl khw Ql khw ggn ky gaun khw kwl ky bnwie sbY kwl hI cbwihˆgy ]

en.bdb: Not only to speak of the residents of water, earth and wanders of the sky, all those created by god of death will ultimately be devoured ( destroyed) by him.

transliteration.en: jal kahaa thal kahaa gagan ke gaun kahaa kaal ke banai sabai kaal hee chabaahi(n)ge ||
transliteration.hi: जल कहा थल कहा गगन के गउन कहा काल के बनाइ सबै काल ही चबाहिंगे ॥
transliteration.ur: جل کها تھل کها گگن کے گان کها کال کے بناا سبَے کال هیِ چباهˆگے ۔۔

en.bdb: Just as the light merged in darkness and the darkness in the light all the created beings generated by the Lord will ultimately merge in Him. 18.88.

verses.gurmukhi: kUkq iPrq kyqy rovq mrq kyqy jl mYN fubq kyqy Awg mYN jrq hYN ]

verses.gurmukhi: kyqy gMg bwsI kyqy mdInw mkw invwsI kyqk audwsI ky BRmwey eI iPrq hYN ]

verses.gurmukhi: jY jMpq byd purwn sBw ]

en.bdb: All the Vedas and Puranas hail Him!

pu.ss: swry vyd Aqy purwx (ijs dI) jY jY jpdy hn,
pu.bdb: swry vyd Aqy purwx (ijs dI) jY jY jpdy hn,

transliteration.en: jai ja(n)pat bedh puraan sabhaa ||
transliteration.hi: जै जंपत बेद पुरान सभा ॥
transliteration.ur: جَے جمپت بےد پُران سبھا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh byd kqyb AnMq khY ]

en.bdb: The Vedas and Katebs (Semitic Scriptures) call Him Infinite!

pu.ss: ijs nUM vyd Aqy kqyb byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn,
pu.bdb: ijs nUM vyd Aqy kqyb byAMq byAMq kihMdy hn,

transliteration.en: jeh bedh kateb ana(n)t kahai ||
transliteration.hi: जिह बेद कतेब अनंत कहै ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه بےد کتےب انںت کهَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh BUq ABUq n Byd lhY ]17]157]

en.bdb: The Gross and Subtle both could not know His Secret! 17. 157

pu.ss: ijs dw sQUl Aqy sUKm koeI vI Byd nhIN pw skdw ]17]157]
pu.bdb: ijs dw sQUl Aqy sUKm koeI vI Byd nhIN pw skdw ]17]157]

transliteration.en: jeh bhoot abhoot na bhedh lahai ||17||157||
transliteration.hi: जिह भूत अभूत न भेद लहै ॥१७॥१५७॥
transliteration.ur: جِه بھُوت ابھُوت ن بھےد لهَے ۔۔۱۷۔۔۱۵۷۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh byd purwn kqyb jpY ]

en.bdb: The Vedas Puranas and Katebs pray to Him!

pu.ss: ijs nUM vyd, purwn Aqy kqyb jpdy hn,
pu.bdb: ijs nUM vyd, purwn Aqy kqyb jpdy hn,

transliteration.en: jeh bedh puraan kateb japai ||
transliteration.hi: जिह बेद पुरान कतेब जपै ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه بےد پُران کتےب جپَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: suqisMDu ADo muK qwp qpY ]

en.bdb: The son of ocean ie moon with face upside down performs austerities for His realization!

pu.ss: smuMdr dw pu`qr (cMdRmw ijs dw) mUDy mUMh qp kr irhw hY;
pu.bdb: smuMdr dw pu`qr (cMdRmw ijs dw) mUDy mUMh qp kr irhw hY;

transliteration.en: sutasi(n)dh adho mukh taap tapai ||
transliteration.hi: सुतसिंधु अधो मुख ताप तपै ॥
transliteration.ur: سُتسںدھ ادھو مُکھ تاپ تپَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: keI klpn lO qp qwp krY ]

en.bdb: He performs austerities for many kalpas (ages) !

pu.ss: keI (swDk) klpw ijMny lMby smyW qoN qpisAw ivc mgn hn,
pu.bdb: keI (swDk) klpw ijMny lMby smyW qoN qpisAw ivc mgn hn,

transliteration.en: kiee kalapan lau tap taap karai ||
transliteration.hi: कई कलपन लौ तप ताप करै ॥
transliteration.ur: کای کلپن لَو تپ تاپ کرَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: nhI nYku ikRpw iniD pwn prY ]18]158]

en.bdb: Still the Merciful Lord is not realized by him even for a short while! 18. 158

pu.ss: (pr aunHw dy) ikRpwinD (pRBU) iblkul h`Q nhIN lg irhw ]18]158]
pu.bdb: (pr aunHw dy) ikRpwinD (pRBU) iblkul h`Q nhIN lg irhw ]18]158]

transliteration.en: nahee naik kirapaa nidh paan parai ||18||158||
transliteration.hi: नही नैकु कृपा निधि पान परै ॥१८॥१५८॥
transliteration.ur: نهیِ نَےک کرپا ندھ پان پرَے ۔۔۱۸۔۔۱۵۸۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh Pokt Drm sBY qij hY ]

en.bdb: Those who forsake all the fake religions !

pu.ss: ijhVy lok swry ivArQ Drm kwrj Cf idMdy hn
pu.bdb: ijhVy lok swry ivArQ Drm kwrj Cf idMdy hn

transliteration.en: jeh fokaT dharam sabhai taj hai ||
transliteration.hi: जिह फोकट धरम सभै तजि है ॥
transliteration.ur: جِه پھوکٹ دھرم سبھَے تج هَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: iek ic`q ikRpw iniD ko jip hYN ]

en.bdb: And meditate on the Merciful Lord single-mindedly !

pu.ss: Aqy iekwgr mn nwl prmwqmw nUM jpdy hn,
pu.bdb: Aqy iekwgr mn nwl prmwqmw nUM jpdy hn,

transliteration.en: eik chi't kirapaa nidh ko jap hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: इक चित्त कृपा निधि को जपि हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ِاک چّت کرپا ندھ کو جپِ هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qyaU Xw Bv swgr ko qr hYN ]

en.bdb: They ferry across this dreadful world-ocean !

pu.ss: auhI (lok) Bv-swgr nUM qrdy hn,
pu.bdb: auhI (lok) Bv-swgr nUM qrdy hn,

transliteration.en: teuoo yaa bhav saagar ko tar hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: तेऊ या भव सागर को तर हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: تےاُو ےا بھو ساگر کو تر هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Bv BUl n dyih punr Dr hYN ]19]159]

en.bdb: And never come again in human body even by mistake! 19. 159

pu.ss: iPr Bul ky vI jgq ivc SrIr Dwrn nhIN krdy (Bwv mukq ho jwdy hn) ]19]159]
pu.bdb: iPr Bul ky vI jgq ivc SrIr Dwrn nhIN krdy (Bwv mukq ho jwdy hn) ]19]159]

transliteration.en: bhav bhool na dheh punar dhar hai(n) ||19||159||
transliteration.hi: भव भूल न देहि पुनर धर हैं ॥१९॥१५९॥
transliteration.ur: بھو بھُول ن دےه پُنر دھر هَےں ۔۔۱۹۔۔۱۵۹۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: iek nwm ibnw nhI kot bRqI ]

en.bdb: Without One Lord’s Name one cannot be saved even by millions of fasts!

pu.ss: iek nwm (dy ismrn) qoN ibnw kroVw vrqw (nwl mukqI) nhIN huMdI,
pu.bdb: iek nwm (dy ismrn) qoN ibnw kroVw vrqw (nwl mukqI) nhIN huMdI,

transliteration.en: eik naam binaa nahee koT bratee ||
transliteration.hi: इक नाम बिना नही कोट ब्रती ॥
transliteration.ur: ِاک نام بنا نهیِ کوٹ برتیِ ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: iem byd aucwrq swrsuqI ]

en.bdb: The Superb Shrutis (of the Vedas) declare thus!

pu.ss: ies pRkwr dy vydw dy kQn srsvqI aucwrdI hY।
pu.bdb: ies pRkwr dy vydw dy kQn srsvqI aucwrdI hY।

transliteration.en: eim bedh uchaarat saarasutee ||
transliteration.hi: इम बेद उचारत सारसुती ॥
transliteration.ur: ِام بےد اُچارت سارستیِ ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: joaU vw rs ky csky rs hYN ]

en.bdb: Those who are absorbed with the ambrosia of the Name even by Mistake !

pu.ss: ijnHw nUM aus rs dw cskw lg igAw hY,
pu.bdb: ijnHw nUM aus rs dw cskw lg igAw hY,

transliteration.en: jouoo vaa ras ke chasake ras hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जोऊ वा रस के चसके रस हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: جواُو وا رس کے چسکے رس هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qyaU BUl n kwl PMDw Pis hYN ]20]160]

en.bdb: They will not be entrapped in he snare of death! 20. 160

pu.ss: auh Bul ky vI kwl dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]20]160]
pu.bdb: auh Bul ky vI kwl dy PMDy ivc nhIN Psdw ]20]160]

transliteration.en: teuoo bhool na kaal fa(n)dhaa fas hai(n) ||20||160||
transliteration.hi: तेऊ भूल न काल फंधा फसि हैं ॥२०॥१६०॥
transliteration.ur: تےاُو بھُول ن کال پھںدھا پھس هَےں ۔۔۲۰۔۔۱۶۰۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: qÍ pRswid ] nrwj CMd ]

en.bdb: BY THY GRACE. NARAAJ STANZA

pu.ss: qyrI ikRpw nwl: nrwj CMd:
pu.bdb: qyrI ikRpw nwl: nrwj CMd:

transliteration.en: tavai prasaadh || naraaj chha(n)dh ||
transliteration.hi: त्व प्रसादि ॥ नराज छंद ॥
transliteration.ur: تو پرساد ۔۔ نراج چھںد ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AgMj Awid dyv hYN ABMj BMj jwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: The Primal Lord is Eternal, He may be comprehended as the breaker of the Unbreakable.

pu.ss: (aus prmwqmw nUM) mu`F qoN hI Atu`t Aqy nw nSt kIqy jw skx vwilAW nUM vI nSt krn vwlw jwixAw jwdw hY;
pu.bdb: (aus prmwqmw nUM) mu`F qoN hI Atu`t Aqy nw nSt kIqy jw skx vwilAW nUM vI nSt krn vwlw jwixAw jwdw hY;

transliteration.en: aga(n)j aadh dhev hai(n) abha(n)j bha(n)j jaaneeaai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: अगंज आदि देव हैं अभंज भंज जानीऐं ॥
transliteration.ur: اگںج آد دےو هَےں ابھںج بھںج جانیِاَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ABUq BUq hYN sdw AgMj gMj mwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: He is ever both Gross and Subtle, He assails the Unassailable.

pu.ss: (auh) sdw sUKm, sQUl hY Aqy nw tu`t skx vwilAW nUM qoVn vwlw smiJAw jwdw hY;
pu.bdb: (auh) sdw sUKm, sQUl hY Aqy nw tu`t skx vwilAW nUM qoVn vwlw smiJAw jwdw hY;

transliteration.en: abhoot bhoot hai(n) sadhaa aga(n)j ga(n)j maaneeaai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: अभूत भूत हैं सदा अगंज गंज मानीऐं ॥
transliteration.ur: ابھُوت بھُوت هَےں سدا اگںج گںج مانیِاَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: Adyv dyv hYN sdw AByv Byv nwQ hYN ]

en.bdb: He is both god and demon, He is the Lord of both covert and overt.

pu.ss: (auh) sdw dyv Aqy Adyv (dYNq) hY Aqy Byd-Xukq Aqy Byd-rihq (igAwn dw) suAwmI hY;
pu.bdb: (auh) sdw dyv Aqy Adyv (dYNq) hY Aqy Byd-Xukq Aqy Byd-rihq (igAwn dw) suAwmI hY;

transliteration.en: adhev dhev hai(n) sadhaa abhev bhev naath hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: अदेव देव हैं सदा अभेव भेव नाथ हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ادےو دےو هَےں سدا ابھےو بھےو ناتھ هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: smsq is`D ibRiD dw sdIv srb swQ hYN ]1]161]

en.bdb: He is the Donor of all powers and ever accompanies all. 1.161.

pu.ss: swrIAW is`DIAW nUM ivkisq krn vwlw Aqy sdw sB dw swQI hY ]1]161]
pu.bdb: swrIAW is`DIAW nUM ivkisq krn vwlw Aqy sdw sB dw swQI hY ]1]161]

transliteration.en: samasat si'dh biradh dhaa sadheev sarab saath hai(n) ||1||161||
transliteration.hi: समसत सिद्ध बृधि दा सदीव सरब साथ हैं ॥१॥१६१॥
transliteration.ur: سمست سّدھ بردھ دا سدیِو سرب ساتھ هَےں ۔۔۱۔۔۱۶۱۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AnwQ nwQ nwQ hYN ABMj BMj hYN sdw ]

en.bdb: He is the Patron of patronless and breaker of the Unbreakable.

pu.ss: (auh) prmwqmw sdw AnwQw dw nwQ (suAwmI) hY; nw BMny jw skx vwilAW nUM BMnx vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: (auh) prmwqmw sdw AnwQw dw nwQ (suAwmI) hY; nw BMny jw skx vwilAW nUM BMnx vwlw hY;

transliteration.en: anaath naath naath hai(n) abha(n)j bha(n)j hai(n) sadhaa ||
transliteration.hi: अनाथ नाथ नाथ हैं अभंज भंज हैं सदा ॥
transliteration.ur: اناتھ ناتھ ناتھ هَےں ابھںج بھںج هَےں سدا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AgMj gMj gMj hYN sdIv is`D ibRiD dw ]

en.bdb: He is the Donor of treasure to treasureless and also Giver of power.

pu.ss: (auh) ^zwinAW qoN vwiJAW nUM sdw ^zwny bKSx vwlw hY Aqy is`DIAW ivc vwDw krn vwlw hY;
pu.bdb: (auh) ^zwinAW qoN vwiJAW nUM sdw ^zwny bKSx vwlw hY Aqy is`DIAW ivc vwDw krn vwlw hY;

transliteration.en: aga(n)j ga(n)j ga(n)j hai(n) sadheev si'dh biradh dhaa ||
transliteration.hi: अगंज गंज गंज हैं सदीव सिद्ध बृधि दा ॥
transliteration.ur: اگںج گںج گںج هَےں سدیِو سّدھ بردھ دا ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AnUp rUp srUp hYN AiC`j qyj mwnIAYN ]

en.bdb: His form is unique and His Glory be considered invincible.

pu.ss: (aus dw) srUp aupmw qoN rihq rUp vwlw hY Aqy (aus nUM) Amuk qyj vwlw smiJAw jwdw hY;
pu.bdb: (aus dw) srUp aupmw qoN rihq rUp vwlw hY Aqy (aus nUM) Amuk qyj vwlw smiJAw jwdw hY;

transliteration.en: anoop roop saroop hai(n) achhi'j tej maaneeaai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: अनूप रूप सरूप हैं अछिज्ज तेज मानीऐं ॥
transliteration.ur: انُوپ رُوپ سرُوپ هَےں اچھّج تےج مانیِاَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: sdIv is`D buiD dw pRqwp p`qR jwnIAYN ]2]162]

en.bdb: He is the chastiser of powers and is the Splendour-incarnate. 2.162.

pu.ss: (aus nUM) sdw Su`D bu`DI dyx vwlw Aqy pRqwp dw pRmwx-p`qr mMinAw jwdw hY ]2]162]
pu.bdb: (aus nUM) sdw Su`D bu`DI dyx vwlw Aqy pRqwp dw pRmwx-p`qr mMinAw jwdw hY ]2]162]

transliteration.en: sadheev si'dh budh dhaa prataap pa'tr jaaneeaai(n) ||2||162||
transliteration.hi: सदीव सिद्ध बुधि दा प्रताप पत्त्र जानीऐं ॥२॥१६२॥
transliteration.ur: سدیِو سّدھ بُدھ دا پرتاپ پّتر جانیِاَےں ۔۔۲۔۔۱۶۲۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: n rwg rMg rUp hYN n rog rwg ryK hYN ]

en.bdb: He is without affection, colour and form and without the ailment, attachment and sign.

pu.ss: (aus nUM) nw moh ('rwg') hY Aqy nw hI (aus dw koeI) rUp-rMg hY Aqy nw hI rog Aqy mmqw dI koeI lkIr hY।
pu.bdb: (aus nUM) nw moh ('rwg') hY Aqy nw hI (aus dw koeI) rUp-rMg hY Aqy nw hI rog Aqy mmqw dI koeI lkIr hY।

transliteration.en: n raag ra(n)g roop hai(n) na rog raag rekh hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: न राग रंग रूप हैं न रोग राग रेख हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ن راگ رںگ رُوپ هَےں ن روگ راگ رےکھ هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AdoK Adwg Ad`g hYN ABUq ABRm AByK hYN ]

en.bdb: He is devoid of blemish, stain and traud, He is without element, illusion and guise.

pu.ss: (auh) doS-rihq, by-dwZ, swVrihq, BOiqk q`qÍw qoN mukq Aqy Brmw qy ByKw qoN pry hY।
pu.bdb: (auh) doS-rihq, by-dwZ, swVrihq, BOiqk q`qÍw qoN mukq Aqy Brmw qy ByKw qoN pry hY।

transliteration.en: adhokh adhaag adha'g hai(n) abhoot abhram abhekh hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: अदोख अदाग अदग्ग हैं अभूत अभ्रम अभेख हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ادوکھ اداگ ادّگ هَےں ابھُوت ابھرم ابھےکھ هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: n qwq mwq jwq hYN n pwiq ichn brn hYN ]

en.bdb: He is without father, mother and caste and He is without lineage, mark and colour.

pu.ss: (aus dw) nw ipqw hY, nw mwqw, nw jwiq hY Aqy nw brwdrI, nw hI koeI icMnH jw vrn hY।
pu.bdb: (aus dw) nw ipqw hY, nw mwqw, nw jwiq hY Aqy nw brwdrI, nw hI koeI icMnH jw vrn hY।

transliteration.en: n taat maat jaat hai(n) na paat chihan baran hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: न तात मात जात हैं न पाति चिहन बरन हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: ن تات مات جات هَےں ن پات چهن برن هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: AdyK AsyK AByK hYN sdIv ib`su Brn hYN ]3]163]

en.bdb: He is Imperceptible, perfect and guiseless and is always the Sustainer of the Universe. 3.163.

pu.ss: (auh) AidRSt, AnMq (ASyS) ByK-rihq Aqy sdw sMswr dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY ]3]163]
pu.bdb: (auh) AidRSt, AnMq (ASyS) ByK-rihq Aqy sdw sMswr dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY ]3]163]

transliteration.en: adhekh asekh abhekh hai(n) sadheev bi's bharan hai(n) ||3||163||
transliteration.hi: अदेख असेख अभेख हैं सदीव बिस्सु भरन हैं ॥३॥१६३॥
transliteration.ur: ادےکھ اسےکھ ابھےکھ هَےں سدیِو بّس بھرن هَےں ۔۔۳۔۔۱۶۳۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ibsÍMBr ibsunwQ hYN ibsyK ibsÍ Brn hYN ]

en.bdb: He is the Creator and Master of the Universe and especially its Sustainer.

pu.ss: (auh) jgq nUM Brn vwlw Aqy aus dw suAwmI hY Aqy ivSyS rUp ivc sMswr dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY।
pu.bdb: (auh) jgq nUM Brn vwlw Aqy aus dw suAwmI hY Aqy ivSyS rUp ivc sMswr dI pwlnw krn vwlw hY।

transliteration.en: bisavai(n)bhar bisunaath hai(n) bisekh bisavai bharan hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: बिस्वंभर बिसुनाथ हैं बिसेख बिस्व भरन हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: بِسوںبھر بسناتھ هَےں بسےکھ بسو بھرن هَےں ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijmI jmwn ky ibKY sdIv krm Brm hYN ]

en.bdb: Within the earth and the universe, He is always engaged in actions.

pu.ss: (auh) DrqI Aqy AwkwS ivcwly sdw hox vwly krmw dw sMXojk hY।
pu.bdb: (auh) DrqI Aqy AwkwS ivcwly sdw hox vwly krmw dw sMXojk hY।

transliteration.en: jimee jamaan ke bikhai sadheev karam bharam hai(n) ||
transliteration.hi: जिमी जमान के बिखै सदीव करम भरम हैं ॥
transliteration.ur: جِمیِ جمان کے بکھَے سدیِو کرم بھرم هَےں ۔۔

en.bdb: He is without malice, without guise, and is known as the Accountless Master.

transliteration.en: dhusaT harataa sirasaT karataa jagat mai jeh gaath ||

verses.gurmukhi: BUq Bib Biv`K Bvwn pRmwn dyv AgMj ]

en.bdb: He, the Invincible Lord, is the same in the Past, Present and Future.

pu.bdb: (auh) AnSvr prm-s`qw BUq, BivK Aqy vrqmwn (iqMnw kwlw) qk mOjUd hY।

verses.gurmukhi: Awid AMq Anwid sRI piq prm purK ABMj ]12]192]

en.bdb: He, the Lord of maya, the Immortal and unassailable Supreme Purusha, was there in the beginning and will be there at the end.12.192.

verses.gurmukhi: Drm ky Ankrm jyqk kIn qaun pswr ]

pu.bdb: Drm Aqy Drm nwl sMbMiDq hor ijqny krm hn, aunHw dw pswrw (ausy ny) kIqw hY;

verses.gurmukhi: dust hrqw pust krqw isRsit hrqw kwm ]13]193]

en.bdb: His works include the decimation of tyrants, giving of strength (to the saints) and support to the world.13.193.

pu.ss: (auh) duStw dw nwSk, isRStI dw krqw, idAwlU Aqy ipAwrw goibMd hY।
pu.bdb: (auh) duStw dw nwSk, isRStI dw krqw, idAwlU Aqy ipAwrw goibMd hY।

verses.gurmukhi: im`qR pwlk s`qR Gwlk dIn dÎwl mukMd ]

pu.bdb: (auh) imqrw dI pwlnw krn vwlw, vYrIAW nUM nSt krn vwlw, dInidAwl Aqy mukqIdwqw hY।

verses.gurmukhi: AGO dMfx dust KMfx kwl hUM ky kwl ]

pu.bdb: sB dw KMfn krn vwlw, sB nUM dMf dyx vwlw Aqy sB dw injI pRkwS ('Bwm') hY (ArQwq sB ivc aus dI joiq mOjUd hY)।

verses.gurmukhi: dust hrqw ibsÍ Brqw Awid rUp Apwr ]

pu.ss: duStw nUM mwrn vwlw, jgq dI pwlnw krn vwlw Aqy Apwr Awid rUp vwlw hY।
pu.bdb: duStw nUM mwrn vwlw, jgq dI pwlnw krn vwlw Aqy Apwr Awid rUp vwlw hY।

pu.bdb: (ijs dw) vyd, iSv, rudR Aqy bRhmw rh`s nhIN jwx sky,

transliteration.hi: अनछिज्ज तेज अनभिज्ज अदाग ॥१०॥२४०॥

verses.gurmukhi: jl Ql mhIp bn qn durMq ]

en.bdb: He is the king of waters and lands; He, the Infinite Lord pervades the forests and the blades of grass!;

transliteration.ur: جل تھل مهیِپ بن تن دُرںت ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh nyiq nyiq ins idn aucrMq ]

en.bdb: He is called ‘Neti, Neti’ (Not this, Not this…Infinite) night and day

pu.bdb: ijs nUM rwq-idn byAMq byAMq khIdw hY।

pu.bdb: auh audwr srUp vwlw dInw-duKIAW dw doK hrn vwlw hY ]11]241]

transliteration.hi: दीनान दोख दहिता उदार ॥११॥२४१॥
transliteration.ur: دیٍنان دوکھ دهِتا اُدار ۔۔۱۱۔۔۲۴۱۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: keI kot ieMdR ijh pwinhwr ]

en.bdb: Millions of Indras are at His service!

pu.bdb: ijs dy keI kroVw ieMdr pwxI Brdy hn (syvw krdy hn);

transliteration.ur: کای کوٹ اںدر جه پانهار ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: keI koit r`dR jugIAw duAwr ]

verses.gurmukhi: keI byd ibAws bRhmw AnMq ]

en.bdb: Many Ved Vyas and innumerable Brahmas!

pu.bdb: keI vydivAws Aqy bySumwr bRhmw

transliteration.en: kiee bedh biaas brahamaa ana(n)t ||

transliteration.ur: کای بےد بآس برهما انںت ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: ijh nyq nyq ins idn aucrMq ]12]242]

pu.bdb: ijs nUM rwq idn byAMq byAMq (kih ky) aucwrdy hn ]12]242]

transliteration.hi: जिह नेत नेत निस दिन उचरंत ॥१२॥२४२॥
transliteration.ur: جِه نےت نےت نس دن اُچرںت ۔۔۱۲۔۔۲۴۲۔۔

pu.bdb: qyrI ikRpw nwl: sÍYXy:

transliteration.hi: त्व प्रसादि ॥ स्वय्ये ॥

verses.gurmukhi: dInn kI pRiqpwl krY inq sMq aubwir gnImn gwrY ]

en.bdb: He always Sustains the Lowly, protects the saints and destroys the enemies.

pu.ss: (auh pRBU) dInw-duKIAW dI sdw pRiqpwlnw krdw hY, sMqw nUM aubwrdw hY Aqy AiqAwcwrIAW dw ivnwS krdw hY।

transliteration.en: dheenan kee pratipaal karai nit sa(n)t ubaar ganeeman gaarai ||
transliteration.hi: दीनन की प्रतिपाल करै नित संत उबारि गनीमन गारै ॥
transliteration.ur: دیٍنن کیِ پرتپال کرَے نت سںت اُبار گنیِمن گارَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: p`C psU ng nwg nrwDp srb smY sB ko pRiqpwrY ]

en.bdb: At all times he Sustains all, animals, birds, mountains (or trees), serpents and men (kings of men).

pu.ss: pMCIAW, pSUAW, phwVw, s`pw Aqy rwijAW dI sB vyly pRiqpwlnw krdw hY।
pu.bdb: pMCIAW, pSUAW, phwVw, s`pw Aqy rwijAW dI sB vyly pRiqpwlnw krdw hY।

transliteration.ur: پّچھ پسُو نگ ناگ نرادھپ سرب سمَے سبھ کو پرتپارَے ۔۔

verses.gurmukhi: poKq hY jl mY Ql mY pl mY kil ky nhIN krm ibcwrY ]

en.bdb: He Sustains in an instant all the beings living in water and on land and doth not ponder over their actions.

pu.ss: (jo) jl-Ql (ivcly jIvw) dw pl ivc hI pwlx poSx krdw hY Aqy kil-kwl (ivc hox vwilAW dw) krm nhIN ivcwrdw।
